choices: Survivor in a post apocalyptic world.
Commoner of a medieval fantasy world.
1.content:
Hello! And welcome to my first ever tickle interactive! :D

This is the introductory chapter where you will select your ticklish storyline.
(And remember to feel free to add your own chapters!)

Choose from the following...
1.title: Introduction

11.content:
After a world-wide war, much of the world is left in a desert wasteland; left with little order. Not much of humanity is left, but most of those who survived, survive as scavengers who resort to stealing, and doing anything for food and shelter.

Luckily, you have been able to survive for quite a while after the war, due to your cleverness and wit. But a strand of bad luck has come your way and you haven't been able to find much supplies in abandoned towns, and decide you need to go into some of the populated areas to find a way for more supplies. Unfortunately, these places can be quite dangerous, as there have not been any laws or order ever since the war, and pretty much anything goes.

You decide to head towards...
11.title: Survivor in a post apocalyptic world.

choices: Wake up, tied down in someone's bed.
Wake up outside, to the pokes of a group of people.
111.content:
You decide to head north to Tickle Town, a dusty, and moderately sized town, which you are sure is to have some sort of job in need of doing. You've heard rumors that the town gets its name from the inhabitants lustful tickling nature; but of course you don't believe this, after all who has time to tickle people, in such a day and age?

After a short journey, you finally arrive at Tickle Town, the same as it's always been; a few crowds of people here and there, but overall pretty quiet. As you walk towards the town, you are given a few strange looks. Then you make your way to the bar and once you enter, you see it is lightly packed with people. Most wearing the usual outfit, a standard brown/tannish jacket, and some pants, maybe accompanied by a pair of goggles.

As you make your way up to the front, you're greeted by the bartender; a young girl, maybe 18 years old, with dirty blonde hair and dark, tanned skin.
"Good evening sir, what'll it be today?

"Just some water is fine," you reply.

As you look around, you see two girls at a table in the corner staring at you; one of them is a skinny middle aged women with dark red hair, and the other is a pale brunette, who is about the same age as her friend. When you see them, they don't break the stare so you look away, you don't want any trouble already.

A few seconds later, you notice the two girls who were staring at you go up to the bartender and whisper something in her ear, as they smile. Then they exit the bar, giving you a a strange grin as they leave. You look away confused; what were they so happy about? Why did they look at me?

Then your train of thought is interrupted as the bartender comes with your water.
"Your water, sir." She says, handing you the glass.

"Thanks." You reply, gulping the whole thing in one drink.

The journey here must have made you really thirsty, you thought, and... tired? Suddenly, you black out, and...
111.title: Tickle Town

1112.content:
As you wake up to the colorful orange sunset, still confused and tired, you begin hearing the sound of murmurs around you, and you then see a large group of towns-people gathered around. As you try to move, you notice you can't, and take a look at your surroundings; you are tied to a wooden post on a platform with your feet in stocks. Then a feminine voice speaks...

"Hello ladies and gentleman! This here is going to be our first auction of the day..."

You notice it's the dark haired woman from the bar, and next to her is her friend. As you realize what she had just said, you angrily interrupt her...

"What the hell do you mean 'auction'?!? I'm not a slave!"

"Don't worry cutie, we're only selling you for the ticklish desires of our people," She replies in a teasing tone.

"TICKLING?!?"

"Yeah, there's a reason this is called Tickle Town, you know," She says giggling, "...and besides, it's only tickling right?"

"But I didn't go up for auction willingly," You reply, frustrated.

Ignorning you, she looks away from you and back towards the crowd...

"Now before we start the bidding, let's have a little fun with our delicate ticklee," She says looking back at you, with a wide grin.

Before, the crowd was small, but has now grown even larger, as people became more interested, after hearing such an offer.

"Who will volunteer to have a go at making our tickle toy cry?" She yells out into the crowd.

Immediately, a wave of hands rises and the chatting and murmuring becomes even louder. Then, the volunteers are picked...

"Okay! How about... you two! In the far left."

As they walk onto stage you see...
1112.title: They must have drugged you!

choices: A local farmer, with a "unique" way of tickling.
11121.content:
You see two young blonde twin sisters, who can't be more than 17 years of age, with dirty hair, and dusty skin. One is wearing a tattered t-shirt, with a brown coat over it, and the other is wearing a grey overcoat. As they walk onto stage, they go towards you; one of them at your feet, and the other behind you.

"Start whenever you're ready, ladies." Says the woman who got you into this.

"Tell me, where are you most sensitive?" Teases the girl at your feet.

Then she starts to lightly slide her palms up and down the bottoms of your feet, causing you to burst out with laughter. Then, as if on queue, the other twin behind you pulls up your shirt, and starts prodding your sides and belly.

"Let's start the bidding at five cans of food."

Still being tormented by the girls, you decide to intervene.

"NOHAHAHA, NO PLEAHAHAHAAESE, STOHAHAP"

Then the girl at your feet decides to lickle your feet as the girl behind you spiders her fingers up from your belly to your armpits. Then the other girl begins to slide her tongue on the sides of your foot, causing you to melt with giggles.

"WHAT THE HAHHAHAHA"

"Oh? Does that tickle?" She teases you.

Then she starts to add in a few soft bites to your toes, followed by some licks and kisses. And by 10 minutes of being at their ticklish mercy, your feet are soaked in saliva, and you're beginning to break a sweat when suddenly...

"Ok that ends the bidding!" The woman said, "Our little tickle toy is sold to..."
11121.title: Two young twin sisters.

choices: Clean him/her off, and take them to the Tickle Fighting Pits!
Clean him/her off, and use them as a tickle slave!
Clean him/her off, and send them out with a scavenging party!
111211.content:
"To these two...people of fortune!" the woman exclaims happily, taking the ammunition and water purifying tablets your purchasers offered to her. One look at your buyers and you can tell they're bandits, who are never so brazen to attack Tickle Town but are still allowed to trade within its rusty walls.

The first has on a leather and chain jacket, tight hide pants jangling with chains and trophies, and biking gloves on. Much of her skin is bared to keep away the heat, but her skin is still pale even in the sun. Her head is half-shaved, with unevenly shorn pink hair falling down the unshaven side. The other woman wears a long, coarse cloak with the hood down, leather kneepads and combat boots. A head of unkempt black hair flows out from above her ragged clothing and tan, pretty face.

The cloaked bandit grabs your chain (a collar with a chain on it has been attached to your neck so you don't run from the auction) and pulls you along, out of the gate to the road beyond the town's scrap metal walls. The pink haired woman keeps you moving along with a teasing poke in the side if you stumble, which you do often owing to your bound hands and the rough, dirty ground. What is it with tickle torture after the apocalypse? you think to yourself. Gradually the hanging lights and sounds of humanity move away from you as you and the bandits move away from Tickle Town.

The road runs east away from the "civilized" Tickle Town, through what was once the rural suburbs of a town long ago. Nothing approaches you as you walk among the abandoned houses, probably out of fear of your two captors/buyers/owners, but you see strangely clad figures with torches and flashlights scramble away or peer closer at the three of you as you make your way towards wherever you're heading. Are the figures mutants? Scavengers? Tribals? Who knows?

Eventually you come to what was once a walled off roofed mall. The windows on the bottom floors have been smashed out and covered with metal, and the only entrance is a hand cranked lift guarded by several bandits on a scrap balcony above. The mall is now a raider den, no doubt teeming with crazed and greedy rogues. You can hear sporadic laughter echoing within the building to the sound of yells and cheers, which grows louder as the male guard at the gate's crank recognizes the slaver scouts and lets you in.

Inside, you are pulled by the mall's interior second floor balcony, peering down into what was the pavilion. It's been dug into and built up to resemble a fenced off fighting pit, with throngs of raiders cheering for the tickling carnage going on in the ring. Then the cloaked woman pulls you into a side room, where a middle ranking bandit leader looks at you.

"Hmm..." she says, inspecting your sweat covered body closely, "What to do with you...shall he/she be a tickle slave for one of our comrades? Perhaps a fighter in the arena? Or maybe we have use for an extra body in the supply runs. The raider official turns back to the pink haired and cloaked bandits who bought you after she makes up her mind.

"Kath! Lilah! Take this filthy runt...
111211.title: A couple of bandits.

choices: Beginner's choice. (Choose someone from the list.)
1112111.content:
...to the arena!" She commands excitedly, as you are hauled off away.

"First, let's get you cleaned up in preparation for your first fight." The pink haired raider says, leading you to another room. As you trod up some stairs, you see a rusted door, that has probably been worn down for a while.

"In there should be some water you can use to clean yourself off." She says pointing to the door, "You got five minutes."

A few minutes later you walk out, as clean as you've ever been since the whole apocalypse started. Then you notice your skin feels more sensitive as the the bandits grab hold of you, and you are starting to have second thoughts on how well you should have cleaned yourself.

Moments later, you are brought into another room, and upon entering you notice it's huge! Then, you realize this must be the fighting pits!

Observing your surroundings you notice it's more of a stadium, with sandy covered ground, rather than a simple ring; which is what you had expected. You also notice the many bandits cheering at the ongoing fight- a young man, who you assume is a slave, and a red-haired girl, who you also think is a slave, based on their ragged clothing, and dirtiness. You also can't help but notice how intense the fight is; the girl seems to be winning, as she has the man pinned down with her legs, and is poking at his armpits, causing him to die with laughter, as the crowd follows along joyfully.

Astonished with how seriously they seem to be taking the fight, you are brought into a side room, where you see many other slaves chat with each other, while they wait their turn. Then the bandits who brought you in pull you aside.

"Look, you probably already know what you're going to be doing, based off of what you've already seen." The hooded bandit says, "But let me explain what you're going to be doing exactly; you're going to go into the pits, and have a tickle fight- right?"

You nod, following along with what she says.

"But there's also some other things you need to know. Depending on how long you last, you will be in there for no more than an hour, and there are no rules, anything goes. Tools, and other things such as feathers, tickle oil, and rope will also be distributed during the match to give both fighters a chance."

"So when will I start?" You reply, feeling a slight touch of anxiety, due to your deathly ticklish body.

The red haired bandit looks at a written list, "Ah! Your first match is against..."
1112111.title: Tickle Fighting Pits!

choices: You try to surprise her, and attack right away.
You realize she also has four arms- no chance winning now I guess ;)
11121111.content:
"...oooh!" She says excitedly, "This will be fun to watch."

"Who is it?" You reply.

"It's one of our mutants- Kate."

"A mutant?!?" You reply, shivering at the very thought of going against a mutant. Mutants you thought, people who have the misfortune of the affects of radiation after the war; most have superhuman strength and can overpower even the strongest of creatures in the wasteland. You've also heard they have various other traits, that give them the upper hand against their opponents and that they are merciless brutes.

"Seems you've got a challenge ahead of you." She says, giggling sadistically., "Oh, and your match starts in a few minutes, be ready..."

After a few minutes of mental preparation, you're ready to accept your ticklish demise; after all how could you, a wasteland scavenger stand a chance against a superhuman brute?

"Ok kid, you're up!" One of the bandits yells into the room, as you're pushed out into the pit. Noticing your surroundings, you see many different things, high hilltops, wooden fences and posts. You then think to yourself that you might be able to use the hilltops as higher ground to overpower your opponent. You also remember the bandits talk about tools like ropes and restraints, which you could use to your advantage, since you won't win with raw strength.

Then you hear a door from the other side of the pit open and you see what the mutant herself. She seems to be the direct opposite of what you had envisioned a mutant to be, based off of what you've heard. She had looked like any other normal person; she was fairly skinny and had dusty tanned skin, with crimson hair, and white eyes, accompanied by regular ragged dark leather clothes, and a brown scarf. She looks towards you and gives you a threatening look, opening her mouth, revealing her extremely long pink tongue, which drooped all the way down to her chin.

"What the hell..." You mutter to yourself, amazed at such a sight.

Then the battle begins...
11121111.title: Kate, the long-tongued mutant!

choices: She manages to get them before you!
Luckily, you get them and cuff her!
111211112.content:
As she charges towards you with tremendous speed, you hardly have time to react and she immediately pounces onto you, leaving you in the dirt... and at the mercy of her wriggling fingers. Seeing such a display of enormous physique, the surrounding crowd roars with joyful delight, as Kate begins delicately scratching at you vulnerable sides.

"HAHAHHEHEHAHAHAH" You squeak out, as her fingernails continue to explore your upper body's most ticklish areas.

Although she didn't seem too strong due to her small appearance, she somehow manages to overpower you; holding both of your arms above your head with only her left hand, and using her right hand to slide under your shirt, and tease your insanely ticklish ribs.

"Tickle tickle tickle! Have I found someone's sensitive spot?" She says, teasing you.

Already a giggling mess, you decide you need to make some sort of move, before you give in and it's too late. You think to yourself, continuously being interrupted by Kate's deadly fingers. Then an idea comes into your head; Maybe I can use my body to gain momentum and push her over!

Seeing this as your only choice other than succumbing to her every desires, you start to wriggle under the dusty floor, gaining momentum with each wiggle. Then you manage to overpower her and get on top, causing an uproar in cheers from the crowd. As you notice she's slightly dazed, you immediately take advantage of the moment and begin your ticklish onslaught.

You start by rolling upper her shirt and wiggling your fingers around her smooth belly, while using your other hand to squeeze her thighs. Under your skillful hands, she goes from a terrifying mutant to a giggling girl.

"Hehehehehehe NOHEHEH NOT THEHEHEHERRE" She screams, feeling one of your fingers dive into her belly button.

Then the both of you notice some handcuffs thrown into the pit from the crowd, and seeing it as the key to your win, you dive for it, but so does Kate...
111211112.title: She fearlessly charges you.

choices: She works her way towards your upper-body.
You lose the match after passing out.
Humiliated, you manage to work up the strength to break free from the bonds!
1112111121.content:
Anxious to jump at the opportunity, you struggle to get up, and you notice Kate jump up and slide towards the cuffs to beat you to them! She then runs towards you and immediately overpowers you with her superhuman strength, and drags you, kicking and wiggling, towards one of the wooden posts. She then lays you down in front of it, and cuffs your hands behind you, and around the post. Tired, you are unable to put up much of a fight, although you probably wouldn't have anyway, and become restrained with ease.

She then pulls out your legs, and begins to slip your tough brown boots off, along with your socks, revealing the recently cleaned, smooth and sensitive soles of your feet.

"Ooh, a tasty reward!" She says excitedly, opening her mouth, revealing her enormous tongue.

"No please, anywhere but there!" You scream, as she lowers herself to your vulnerable soles. Already terrified out of your wits of what is to come next, you look away with your eyes closed, as you feel a slimy, tickling sensation.

She starts by prodding your soles with the tip of her tongue, leaving small trails of saliva up and down the centers of your left foot, while she uses her right hand to spider up and down your other foot, instantaneously causing your to cry out with uncontrolled bursts of laughter.

As her tickling lust is encouraged by your delightful giggles, she starts to use her tongue to its full potential, and starts to lick the entirety of the bottom of your foot with only one swipe of her tongue. All while this is happening, she also ups the intensity of the tickling on your other foot by scratching it up and down, mixing in a few light tickles here and there, to keep you on your toes.

Dying with laughter, something happens...
1112111121.title: She manages to cuff you!

11121111211.content:
Still a giggling mess, you feel her hands slide up from your saliva-covered feet and towards your sensitive inner thighs. Laughing too hard to notice this, you are surprised to a sudden squeeze on both of your thighs, sending a new and more ticklish sensation throughout your body.

"HAHAHHHEHE" You scream as she slides her body closer.

Keeping one hand on your thighs, she uses her other to roll up your sweat covered shirt and you begin to feel her long, slimy tongue go to work on your tummy. Wriggling in the cuffs, you feel her tongue slither slowly up and down, while her soft hands poke, squeeze and prod all over your delicate thighs, throwing your into a state of tiresome laughter.

Then, she gives you a break, she must be tired on her part as well, you don't know how long she had been enjoying your body. Soaked and drooling with exhaustion, something happens...
11121111211.title: She works her way towards your upper-body.

choices: A few stray cats and dogs.
111211112111.content:
In a tired and quiet voice you say, "Ok, ok! I give in, you win..."

With a wide smile on her face, she yells as if announcing to the roaring crowd, "He forfeits! I win!" And she looks back towards you with a smirk, whispering, "And now you get to be publicly tickled, as punishment for forfeiting a match."

Too tired to have a say in this, you pass out right there, in the cuffs.

Later you are awoken, in the midst of the bandit hideout, still drowsy and tired, it is hard for you to see your surrounding, but you come to your senses and realize you're bound in ropes in a standing x-position. You notice a few groups of bandits sitting around fires giving you hungry looks.

Publicly tickled?!? You thought, remembering the events in the tickle fight.

Growing a bit anxious of who's going to take the first shot at you, you are approached by...
111211112111.title: You forfeit the match.

choices: Crowd members begin to join in.
1112111121112.content:
You a see a group of three bandits walk towards you. You look away, so as to not draw any attention to yourself, but you look back and see they're still going straight for you. As they walk closer you notice three feminine figures surround you. They have hoods on to cover their faces, and they wore scratched up, tattered clothes below.

Two of them get on either side of you and one stands in front of you.

"We heard you lost that match a couple of hours ago." The one in front of you says with a smirk. "...and I couldn't help but notice just how ticklish you were, hehe."

And as she finishes her sentence, who other two friends begin to tickle you. One of them occupying your sides, poking and squeezing them, while the other lightly scratches your armpits.

"HeheheHAHAHAHHA" You began laughing as the intensity of their tickles increased.

Through the laughter you noticed the girl in front of you also moved closer, placing her hands at your belly. She starts spidering her fingers up and down.

"HAHAHHAHAHHHHAHAAHHAHAHAHAHAHA STOP HAHAHANYWHEHAHAHERE BUT THEREAAAAA" You said, as your tummy was one of your weakest and most vulnerable spots.

"What was that? Anywhere, but here?" She said teasing you, as she began to use both of her hands to tickle your belly. All while this is happening, both other girls keep on tickling your sides and armpits, adding on to your laughter.

You notice a crowd gathering and laughing at your display, what happens next?
1112111121112.title: The hooded bandits.

choices: You feel something rubbing against your saliva covered feet
A taunting voice calls out to you
11121111212.content:
Gradually, the mutant's tongue slopping along your sole drives you absolutely up the wall. You're not sure how much more you can take as the slick, slimy, bumpy tongue trails up and down your soles terribly. She then begins to work it in between your toes maliciously, covering your feet in a sheet of saliva that only sensitizes them more.

"Give up!" she says, "Or do I need to keep up the torture?" It's obviously a rhetorical question, she intends to keep up the torture whether you give up or not. Suddenly she reaches up, and while continuing to lick your feet, she reaches out and digs into your hip bones. At this point you feel consciousness slipping away as the electric prods of hip tickling mingle with her tongue on your feet.

As the tickling overwhelms you, you pass out to the sound of your own fading laughter. When you finally come to your senses, you are in a dark room, probably somewhere within the mall the bandits are using as a hideout. Immediately...
11121111212.title: You lose the match after passing out.

choices: A bell rings, and the cell doors open up to the cafeteria.
You feel Rochelle poking your side.
A new cell mate is thrown into the room.
111211112122.content:
Awaking dizzily, you hear a nearby feminine voice. "Lost your first match, eh?" She says tauntingly. Regaining your focus, you become aware of your surroundings. You are in what seems to be a cell, a rather large one, with stone walls, and a concrete floor. The cell is probably built to hold around two to four people. Standing up, you notice a tall, and skinny girl, with dark, raven colored hair, wearing a brownish tanned tank top, and black jeans.

"Where am I, what happened?" You ask, still a little light headed.

"I'm Rochelle, and you're in cell 7 in a prison near the bandit hideout." She replies. "This is where they keep their slaves after their matches, other slaves are sold to bandits and other people as tickle toys."

"So what happened in my match, I was tickled out of my wits."

"You lost... terribly." She says giggling, "You were practically drenched in that mutant's saliva by the end of it."

"Ugh... that explains the dry, sticky feeling on my body, when can I get out of here?"

"We're allowed two days of free time in the bandit hideout, until then, we wait until food is given in the cafeteria."

"That sounds boring." You reply, frustrated at the thought of being in here all day.

"Oh don't worry, there's stuff around the prison, that will tickle your funny bone."

"Like what?"

"Well when food is given out, you have about an hour of free time around the prison, there's a ton of different rooms. You can go to the tickle-sparring rings; the winner gets to tie the loser up and tickle them for as much time as they have left!" She says excitedly.

Just then...
111211112122.title: A taunting voice calls out to you

choices: Go to the cafeteria and try to meet some of the other slaves.
1112111121221.content:
You hear a loud buzz and then the doors of your cells slide open. You begin to hear the thunderous roars of the footsteps of the other slaves leaving their cells.

"Lunch time!" Rochelle says as she starts running out of the cell.

Feeling hungry yourself, and bored, you decide to go along as well. As you walk out of your cell you see some stairs leading to the ground level, and you notice under the stairs are more cells.

This place must be huge! you thought, as you start your way down the stairs along side the crowd of other people, who must be your neighboring cell mates. When you make it to the main floor, you see people lined up at a room, which must be the cafeteria.

You decide to...
1112111121221.title: A bell rings, and the cell doors open up to the...

choices: No, this seems like a trick!
Yes, I might not get this opportunity again.
11121111212211.content:
As you make your way to the line, you hear someone call out to you.

"Psst! You!" You hear.

"Over here!" You hear again, this time you look around and see a hooded figure peeking over a corner. "Come here quick!" The figure whispers loudly, gesturing you to come over.

You make your way over to the corner and observe the hooded person; they are slightly taller than you, and have a feminine voice, but other than that you couldn't see much else, as they had kept their hood on.

"Me and a couple of slaves are planning an escape, but we need some extra hands," she begins studying your body language, "you seem pretty fit, would you help us?"

Do you help them?
11121111212211.title: Go to the cafeteria and try to meet some of the...

111211113.content:
You gape in awe at how unfair this is!

She just grins at you cracking all of her knuckles on both sets of hands. "Guess this will be a cinch" She arrogantly says.

The bell rings and you circle her

You look her up and down, she's barefoot and wearing a small 4 armed version of a tank top. You actually feel insulted that she thought so little of your tickle fighting ability that she doesn't mind flashing bare feet and bare armpits.

That's when
111211113.title: You realize she also has four arms- no chance w...

choices: Give up and forfeit the match
Somehow manage to turn the tables
1112111131.content:
You figure it can't hurt to try catching her off guard and maybe secure an early advantage so you barrel in charging at her, hoping to surprise her. No such luck as Kate grabs you with one set of arms and hoists you up by your wrists into the air.

"I've gotta admit, you've got guts, kid" She says, smiling sadistically at you. "But guts are only going to get you so far."

Kate reaches down with her second set of arms and begins to slip your tough brown boots off, along with your socks, revealing the recently cleaned, smooth and sensitive soles of your feet.

"Ooh, this should be fun" Kate says as she opens her mouth. You realize that you are in big trouble now as Kate's long tongue slithers from her mouth and towards your feet.

"No no, please don't" You plead as you try pulling your hands free from her grasp.

Kate ignores your pleas and soon you feel a slimy, tickling sensation on your soles.

"Heheheheheheh p-please don't dohoho this hehehehehehehehe" You start to giggle as Kate's moist wet tongue travels over your soles.

Kate repeatedly runs her tongue up and down your soles, alternating between your left and right foot. On your left foot, Kate uses slithers her tongue in between your sensitive toes, eliciting shrill giggles from you that only incite her sadism.

"Ooh eeh hehehehehehehehehehe no no not hahahahahahaha the tohohoes heheheheheh anywhere but there hahahahaha" You say, struggling with all your might.

On your right foot, Kate simply runs her tongue along your sole repeatedly, going faster and faster with each stroke, reducing you to a babbling, hysterical wreck.

"Mmm, tasty" Kate comments before she goes back to tickling your feet.

"Heheheheheheheheheheheheh stahahahap hahahaha stahahahap it hahahahah" You try pleading once again as Kate's warm, slimy tongue gracefully glides over your wriggling, flexing feet. When that fails to work, you try kicking Kate in her stomach.

"Still got some fight, left in you, eh?" She asks with a smirk on her face. "Perhaps I was too gentle with you"

With that, Kate brings you down onto the ground. She straddles your hips while still holding your hands over your head with one set of hands. She then uses her second set of hands to roll up your shirt, exposing your tickling upper body.

"You thought was I was doing before was bad?" Kate asks. "Now I'm going to make you really scream."

Kate then begins spidering her fingers up and down your bare belly and you immediately lose it as your tummy is your most ticklish spot.

"AHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAA NOHOHOHO NOT THERE HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA ANYWHERE BUHUHUT THERE HAHAHAHAHAHAHA PLEAHEHEHEHEHESE HAHAHAHAHAHAHA" You burst into laughter, screaming at the top of your lungs.

"What a beautiful ticklish tummy for me to play with" Kate says, taking delight as your squirm beneath her.

"HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA PLEAHEHEHEHESE STAHAHAHAP HEHEHEHEHEHEH GOHOHO BACK TO MY FEEHEEHEEHEEHEEHEET HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA" You beg, your poor tummy twitching from the tickling.

"Ah ah ah, it's a little bit too late for that, my little tickle toy" Kate says, showing you no mercy.

"PLEAHEHEHESE HAHAHAHAHAHA I'LL DO ANYTHING HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA JUHUHUHUST PLEAHEHEHESE STAHAHAHAP HUHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHE" You scream, going absolutely nuts.

"Anything I want? All I want for you to do is laugh for me while I tickle you" Kate says. Making matters worse for you is that Kate has long fingernails that are just perfect for tickling and driving you crazy.

"HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAH MAKE IT STAHAHAHAP MAKE IHIHIHIT STAHAHAHAP HEHEHEHEHEHEHEH" You laugh, unable to wriggle free no matter how much you struggle.

124.content:
Tomorrow, the people of the little village youâve considered home for most of your young life will offer you up to their oppressor. Through no fault of your own (other than being a beautiful and expendable orphan) youâve somehow attracted the fiendâs loathsome attention! Your fate has been ordained.

         The villagers have always been kind to you, though things rarely ever go your way in disagreements, since you are a foundling with no specific family to back you up. In fact, they do tend to pick on you more often than most, and they discovered early on how delightful it is to hear you laughing and giggling your head off from being tickled. So, you bear your people no grudge for their pragmatic decision, but you also know that there is no way you can bear the thought of being the helpless plaything of such an awful creature. Especially when they've always treated you as their red-headed stepchild.

         It is easily the awfullest night of your life, and sleep is out of the question as you contemplate what chances you have for escape into the night while everyone else is asleep. Your heart pounds, and half the night it feels like youâre having panic attacks, as your mind imagines all the horrors youâre liable to be put through before the fiend is finished toying with you, should you choose to just capitulate, and allow yourself to be the next ritual victim.

         ThinkThinkThinkThink!, you think to yourself, Where can I flee to before dawn, when the day-long ceremonies will commence in preparation for tomorrow nightâs sacrifice? MY sacrifice!

         You are not totally without options, though none of them seem particularly strong. They might still be better than facing your fate; though it could also mean the fiend bringing down retribution on the rest of the villagers. You understand their situation, and the nature of the arrangement with the oppressor. You wish you were brave enough to just go along with the plan, and serve as their offertory lamb in an utterly bizarre sacrifice. You truly do. But the people whisper terrifying tales of what happens to those who serve as the villageâs offering, and it makes you shiver just to imagine an hour of it, let along the rest of your life! âNo one else is going to. Iâve got to look out for myself!â, you finally declare to no one in the darkness.

         You decide you have one of two possible options, slim as they both may be.

         You can try to make it to the bandit-plagued main thoroughfare used by the merchants and travelers and performers coming and going along the trade routes. Perhaps you might even find someone willing to take you along with them (wittingly or otherwise) until you are well clear of this village and the whole area, never looking back.

         Or, you might try actually venturing into the fringes of the supposedly haunted Forest of Toothless Ghouls, to seek out the help of the wee little man you once ran across when you were younger. The other children of the village had chased you into the edge of the eerie woods that day out of sheer maliciousness, and while you were hiding from them amidst some thick fir trees, you discovered a little wrinkle-faced man stuck with his foot buried mid-kick into a huge toadstool. At first, he pitched a terrible fit when he saw you, but when you offered to help free him and successfully managed to extricate his boot from the `shroom, he doffed his pointy hat and bowed, declaring that, should you ever be in need, simply return to these woods and whistle, âTweet-Toot-Tootâ, and he would appear. Or words to that effect, if your memory serves you. That was several seasons ago, and what could a little forest gnome like him do to save you from your fate, even IF you were able to retrace your steps from that day, but in the middle of the dark night?

133.content:
(Gonna borrow from The Alien's Feather to start this off, hope you don't mind Carnivore.)

The Nighthawk's an old ship that, by rights, should've been in a junkyard long ago. Rusted patches have been painted over, pipes are leaking and food in the kitchen may or may not be older than the ship itself. But it's got lasers, it's got shields and it's got warp drive and at the end of the day, what else does a pirate ship of the 31st century need?

Of course, most merchant ships give up without a fight anyway. They always look at the guns and not the way the thrusters burn rich, or the fuel leak by the stabilizer that refuses to be locked down. But it helps that the crew- or most of them- are always ready for a fight. First off there's the captain, Sarina- big, heavily armed, razor sharp claws and playing to all the stereotypes when people think Yathi space pirate. She also sleeps with her favorite blankie and snuggly bear, but if that information leaves your lips then an eternity in the tendrils of a koochievine will seem like respite compared to her punishment.

Her first-mate, Morgan Aratino is a hairy tattooed human, almost as tall as Sarina herself, with an unhealthy obsession with plasma grenades and explosives- one that once or twice almost blew the Nighthawk apart. Unlike most humans he's not ticklish despite numerous efforts to prove the contrary. Unfortunately, again unlike most humans, he has no sense of humor and is in either deadpan or berserker mode depending on his mood.

Fileen and Brianna are a pair of gunrunners who were together long before joining the crew of the Nighthawk. Fileen is a Radin- a green-skinned humanoid with antennae, gray hair and a figure that looks good in a sleeveless, skintight bodysuit. Brianna is a blonde human woman that does her best to act tough and aggressive, but It's hard when Radin culture dictates that, after Fileen saved her life, Brianna is now effectively the green alien's tickle slave. Not that she minds and not that Fileen keeps her lover on the end of a chain but she strikes at some unfortunate moments for Brianna's image and reputation. Brianna's all black leather outfit consists of thigh high boots, tight hotpants and a top that covers her breasts and shoulders, but leaves neck, armpits and a whole lot of cleavage exposed. Fileen wouldn't have it any other way.

The pilot is a rare example of a male Kichi and there are some who call him Tim- apparently no other species can pronounce his real name right. He can shoot a laser gun, no problem, but his true calling is flying. Incidentally, he was a drifter with no purpose before joining the crew and was in jail for hot-wiring and joy-riding a diplomat's personal vessel- again.

On the other end of the aggression spectrum is Flin. Flin's an Uru who just found her way aboard one day, was completely unphased by the guns pointed at her and proceeded to establish herself as chief engineer- and the only engineer. Still she's held this bucket of bolts together for a long time and she's friendly enough. Maybe too friendly depending on your choice of attire.

The ship cook is a Giglin called Raol. He's also the ship translator which he obviously has more experience with because the food's terrible- not that anyone will tell him. Brianna did once-she still flinches every time he so much as brushes past her.

Irinda is- well she's in charge of the brig and likes to tickle. An ebony skinned Erimosi with an aversion to wearing clothes, Irinda usually loosens the tongues of a prisoner withholding valuable information- but is just as happy laying her fingers on her fellow crew mates.

Then there's Mindy. The name wasn't hers but Slithers have no concept of identity and she seems to respond to it. Mindy, a gelatinous blue goo, acts as a janitor, absorbing and digesting trash and generally keeping things tidy. She adopts the outline of a not unattractive female humanoid when interacting with people- which could mean anything from taking orders to sticking them in place and tickling them senseless.

Finally there's the ship AI who does all the micromanaging so the crew doesn't have to. ERin, of no relation to the AI on the SP-001 Swift Feather many years ago, the first human ship with warp drive, is a more advanced AI meaning she can deal with a heavy workload and still have a smile on her face- hypothetically. Unfortunately ERin was stolen from an experimental research station before being installed on the Nighthawk and was designed for more up to date software, so some glitches may occur. Still, at least no day's a dull day.

And then of course there's you, the...

13312.content:
Ren is your name, quick thinking and smart-assery are your games. Sure, the second one gets you into trouble more than you care to admit, but the first one usually gets you out- usually.

Short and built for speed not power, what you lack in brawn you make your for in wit and agility.

You're the most recent addition to the crew which is why you're not in charge of the weapons systems. That and your talents lie outside of directing a M4 particle beam. You were an orphan as long as you can recall. Your only family were the other street urchins on a planetary spaceport in the Alpha Centauri system. You had to be quick, you had the agile and you had to know how to pick a pocket now and again.

Spot a mark, grab their coin and melt into the crowd before they realized what happened- or run up a wall, vault over the top, roll on impact to spread the shock and get out of dodge before anyone could find a ladder.

By 17 you were the bane of local law enforcement and unsuspecting spacers on shore leave. Sometimes all it took was feminine charm, sometimes playing the lost little girl. And sometimes it took all your expertise and stamina to grab what you could and escape by a Margin too narrow for a pin. But you always got your target.

Maybe that's why they recruited you. You remember your surprise then horror when you realized the drunken Kichi wasn't drunk and had just wrapped his coils around your legs. But instead of turning you into the police he offered you a cut in an operation more sophisticated than just another pirate attack.

At the end of it you were a few hundred credits, and a nice ball gown, richer. And that was when Sarina asked how a place on a pirate ship and more credits than you could spend sounded.

A year and billions of lightyears later you're a well established member of the crew- just not in the way you envisioned. And less credits than advertised. Still it's a more exciting life than the one you used to live. That's why you never sought legal work isn't it? The suspense of the snatch and the thrill of the chase. Action and adventure are your callings in life.

So Ren of the Nighthawk- cabin girl, true. But also master thief, traceuse extraordinaire and, even if you say so yourself, ravishing femme fatale. The galaxy is yours for the taking.

Your only weakness?

Well, I guess the nature of the story might give you a clue.

But the story begins with you...
