Traveling a far distance by now, the town must be a half mile away, and you notice the amount of trees begins to increase as you continue walking. Soon, you find yourself surrounded in nothing but nature. There are dozens of trees, wherever you look, barely being able to see past them. The ground is covered in an immense amount of foliage; there are flowers, bushes, and grass as far as the trees would let you see.

You continue deeper into the green forest and find a large rock. Deciding you should rest a while, you sit down and take out a flask filled with water. You take a few gulps, before suddenly feeling very drowsy.

You yawn, and without control, your vision begins fading away. Your eyelids begin to close, and soon you were out cold.

You wake up, face to face with...
1532.title: Time to liberate the forest of its denizen'...

choices: The dryad's magic fades away and you break away from your bonds!
15322.content:
A dryad. A tree spirit, mostly not dangerous, but playful. This one was a little shorter than you, somewhere taller than a child, but smaller than the average adult. Her skin was a pale green, and her body was covered in leaves, acting as clothing.

You try to get up, but you realize you are bound to a tree. Its vines holding your arms up above your head, and its roots clamping down your ankles, sturdily into the ground. You realize she must have used magic to restrain you.

"Are you lost?" She said smiling innocently.

"No-uhh, I'm just looking... for stuff." You said, unconvincingly. "Why have you restrained me against this tree?" You say, pulling at the vines around your wrists.

"You know... you shouldn't travel this far alone. I think you should be punished for such foolishness!" She said, quickly shifting from an innocent smile, to a devious grin.

And then she ran to the other side of the tree.

"What... how ar-hehehehehe" You erupt giggling, as you felt her fingers roll up both of your sides.

"Ohhhh, is the little victi--ER, traveler ticklish?" She says, teasing your sides.

"Hehehehehehehe-stohahahap I AM NOT-hehehehe... TICKLISH!" You try yelling out in frustration.

You begin laughing more as she keeps tickling your sides; tapping, poking and pulling at each part. She then moves to your front, and begins tickling your midriff. She starts by poking it with her index finger, causing you to instinctively breath in and try to wiggle away. Then she starts wiggling her fingers against the middle, near your belly button. Held up by the vines, you were stretched up, and could barely move, giving you no break to her tickles.

"HAAAHAHHAHAHANOT THEREHAHHAHAA" You pleaded in between laughs.

"What? Not... here?" The dryad said, as she used one of her hands to also squeeze at your hips; a place you didn't even know was that sensitive.

"EEEEHHAHAHAHAHHAA" You laughed out, at such a surprising tickle.

After a few minutes, the dryad suddenly stopped, and you were panting. You heard her walk away, for a moment. And a few seconds later, heard her again. As your last tears from the tickling fell from your eyes, and you could see clearly, you noticed her sitting down, dipping a brush into a jar. Upon focusing, you noticed she was soaking this brush in some sort of amber liquid; it was slow and gooey, and dripped lazily from the tip of the brush.

The dryad then stoop up, and walked towards you, and rolled up your shirt, all the way up to above your rib cage, leaving the naked skin of your belly exposed. Then she showed you the brush, almost as if she was showing it off.

"This here, is rare oak tree sap, harvested from one of the oldest and magical trees in this forest. To you humans, it tastes bitter and nasty, but the creatures of this forest, go wild for it." She then lowered the brush to your belly, and began slowly spread the tree sap across your taut tummy. When she finished, she had covered nearly all of your midsection--from your sides, to your belly, to your ribs, and all the way down to your waist--you could see the yellowish orange sap glow on your skin, slowly beginning to droop lower.

The dryad then whistled, and almost immediately, two deer came from behind the trees. Then you had an idea of what she was planning.

She then stepped away and sat against a tree, almost as if she was watching a play. In a matter of moments, the deer noticed you, and what you had been covered in, and you prepared for the worst. The deer immediately, as if driven mad by the tree sap, dashed towards you and began licking rapidly against your skin. On both halves of your midsection, you could feel their rough, slender pink tongues glide against the amber sap stuck to your skin.

"HahHAHAHhAHHAHA" You began crying out again, starting to feel a new form of ticklishness.

As the deer both finished cleaning up your sides, leaving no sap behind, one moved downward. It began licking across your waist, just above your pants. The other went towards your center, and began tonguing your inner belly button.

After about 30 minutes of this, the deer had finished. The parts of your body that was once covered in sap was now covered in the deer's saliva. The deer soon ran away, after lapping as much tree sap from your skin as they could.

Then...
15322.title: A dryad.

choices: You try to sneak past them
You strike a bargain with one of the sides.
1533.content:
Getting off the last remaining carriage to just at the outskirts of Areindal, you quickly thank the extremely fearful driver, passing him a few pieces of silver for his troubles. As he cracked his whip, not willing to spend even one more second near the infamous ‘City of Catastrophes’, you did a few stretches, working out the kinks in your aching shoulders from not moving freely for so long, stuck for most of the journey in the small confines of the carriage. Once you felt yourself becoming sufficiently limber again, you set upon the task of entering the town, the outline of its half-destroyed buildings and walls already in view.

Slowly making your way into the city through a decent sized hole in the stone walls, you thank whatever gods there were that the sun was high up in the sky, for if you had made this journey in the night, who knows how you would have found your way in, let alone see anything that would try to take you by surprise. Finally managing to pull your small bag of items that you had always kept close by your side since the start of your journey, you quickly hugged the shadows of the closest buildings, wary of anything or anyone you might encounter in this war-torn town.

Creeping deeper into the city through the dark and abandoned alleyways between buildings, you quickly stop as you hear the sound of flapping above you. Pressing yourself against the wall and hoping that no one spotted you, your eyes opened ever so wider as you caught the sight of a pair of women with white wings zipping past the skies above you. Shortly after, a group of women, this time with bat-like wings on their backs, flew above you as well, probably giving chase to the former two. “If I could just stay hidden from all the action, there should be no problems… Just keep sticking to the shadows…”

After a few more painstakingly slow minutes of cautiously moving about the shadows, you finally came across an obstacle you couldn’t sneak your way through. In a small area near the back of some houses, you could see the outline of two feminine figures circling each other. Making sure that you were sufficiently hidden behind the cover of some barrels, upon closer inspection, you realized that both women were from opposite factions, their appearances and open hostility towards each other quickly giving it away.

Clad in only a few pieces of bronze armor around her chest and waist, along with a fancy helmet and pair of metal boots, the short-haired brunette spoke first, an arrogant look on her facade as she raised her sword and shield, issuing her threat. “I’ve finally caught you, filthy succubus. Now surrender or I’ll make it so!” Nervous, you recognized the front-line fighters of the holy side of the war, the infamous Valkyries, war-hardened soldiers trained from the goddess Athena to act as foot soldier.

“Pfft, did you really think you caught me? I lured you here, where no one could see what would happen to you, much less hear your delicious screams…” Licking her lips, the other woman, a raven-haired beauty with strips of cloth scantily covering her essential areas and a tail sticking out from her rear, started to walk forward, not a care in the world with her prey in front of her. Internally suppressing the urge to run, you also recognized the other woman from her appearance, quickly matching it with the term ‘Succubus’ in your mind from the Hell side of this war.

As the other woman bravely tried to swing at the oncoming threat with her weapon, the Succubus just yawned, dodging all her attempts as easily as if a toddler had tried swinging at her with a stick. Closing the gap with one quick step, the brunette gasped as her opponent managed to get behind her, the latter smirking. “Swinging that little stick at me? You should know better than to try. Now, to relieve you of those toys…” Nails skittering up and down the other’s bare side, the Valkyrie let out a girlish shriek, dropping both her sword and shield as she tried to clumsily hop away.

Recounting the tales that you have heard from the few others such as adventurers who had ventured to this very city, you recalled that many have said to have heard the screams of terror and oddly laughter coming from inside these walls, you yourself dismissing such an impossible claim. However, now you realize that maybe those claims might not have been so far from the truth, your eyes remaining glued to the scene in front of you. Giggling along with her victim, the seductress continued to tease her prey skillfully, finding the gaps in between the others armor. Sliding her fingers smoothly into a small opening in her armor near her underarms, the brunette’s knees finally gave way as she collapsed to the floor, a giggling mess.

Tying up her hands with her tail, the Succubus smirked, taking off the other’s large metal boots. “Such unsightly things, hiding such soft… Smooth… ticklish feet. Coochie Coochie Coo!” Raking her nails up and down her adversary’s now exposed soles, the Valkyrie instantly went hysterical with laughter, her body bucking and down with the effort of escaping the ticklish nails. As her laughter kicked up another notch as the Succubus started to tickle her toes, you thought perhaps you could do something about this situation…
1533.title: No risk no reward, time to head to the holy bat...

choices: A group from heaven being tortured
A minor skirmish breaking out between both sides
A company of Artemis' hunters had found the both of you
15333.content:
Afraid to even breathe, you start to back off from the alleyway, lest they (or more importantly the succubus) notice you. So nervous you were, you didn’t notice that you had bumped a lone metal can, said object slowly rolling to hit the wall with a soft ‘clang’. In an instant, you felt yourself being tackled to the ground, the wind knocked out of you. Looking up, you saw the hungry face of the succubus looking directly into your eyes, already licking her lips at her next meal.

“Eavesdropping, were we? It’s so rare that we have mortals visiting up during our war. Might you be so kind to enlighten me on why you’re here, or do you need some… Convincing, like our friendly Valkyrie over there?” Pointing behind her shoulder, you gulped, not for the first time today as the sight of the slightly giggling warrior from heaven still lay prone on the ground, her knees pulled up to her chest as she guarded her naked feet with her hands, not wanting to experience the fiendish nails of the succubus again. As you felt a tail slowly drawl its way into your shirt, you decided that the risk wasn’t worth it, choosing to spill the beans instead.

“I’m just here for mercenary work, along with just searching the town for items! I’m not a part of this war, honest!” Leaning in closer to give you a quick sniff, she nodded in approval. “I don’t smell any of that pure air from heaven on you… Nor do I smell any of my brethren’s stench on you either. Looks like you are telling the truth. A mortal who’s unaffiliated to any side… Fufufu… Just maybe…” Trying to move back away from the grinning raven-haired demoness, a purple-nailed hand planted itself next to your head, warning you of what would happen should you try to escape.

A sly grin now appearing on her face, she leaned in closer, her hot breath tickling your ear. “Say, how would you like to work for us, hmm? Even though you’re a mortal… Perhaps we could use someone like you with your unique ability to look relatively harmless just like, well… a mortal.” Already seeing where this was going, you opened your mouth to try to refuse. However, before the words could come out, a single finger was placed on your lip. “Of course, we will reward you for your efforts, as well as granting you temporary tools to help aid us. Of course, they come with a price… But it’s not like you have a choice.”

Before you could do anything, the succubus quickly placed her hand on your heart, purple fel-magic flowing around your body. By the time she had removed her hand, she got off you, a mischievous grin on her face as she pointed to your wrist. Now seeing a purple insignia appear on the top of your hand, you tried to rub it away, to no avail. “That’s the mark of the temptress. With that, no creature that is allied with hell will attack you, and will recognize that you are aiding us in this war. It also had some minor benefits, such as creating ethereal rope, summoning a few dark pixies, etc. But of course, I did say there was a price, didn’t I? If you were to betray us…” Snapping her fingers, you gasped out loud in surprise as several purple tattoos appeared on your skin, moving underneath it. As they moved underneath your clothes, you felt the surprising sensation of at least dozen hands tickling all over your body, squeezing your ribs and hips, fluttering across your chest, even digging into your armpits. Leaning against the wall with crazed laughter, the succubus snapped her fingers again as the tattoos went back to their original positions, before fading away.

“And that is what happens if you think of turning tail on us. And just in time, it looks like our heavenly friend over there is about to recover. Now move along. Those people won’t hesitate to help a mortal who’s seemingly lost their way. And don’t forget to help us collect information!” Giving her last instruction, the succubus vanished into thin air. Sighing at how you’ve now become an unwilling participant in this war, you grabbed your items, noticing that the runic insignia on your wrist conveniently vanishing. Walking up to where the Valkyrie was still catching her breath, you forced yourself to keep calm. “Hey, are you alright? You look like you’ve been through a tough battle.”

“It is none of your concern mort-A human?! Here?! What in the heaven’s name are you doing! Don’t you know that this place is dangerous?!” Taking back her sword and shield from where it lay on the ground, the Valkyrie looked you over, a tad suspicious. “So, how did you get here?”

“I climbed through the wall, looking to see if there was anyone else that might have been caught up in the holy war. Before I knew it, I found myself here where you were.” Bluffing your way through, you gave a sigh of relief on the inside as the Valkyrie nodded her head, accepting your statement for now. “Well, I guess it’s our duty to help mortals in need. My name’s Eydr. We best move for now, before that accursed succubus comes back for more.” Gesturing for you to follow her, you both walked along the alleyways, looking out for any signs of trouble.

“So, where are we goi-“ Halting as you see Eydr suddenly raise her hand, you quickly kept quiet, peeking around the corner at where your companion was looking at…
15333.title: You strike a bargain with one of the sides.

choices: The imps succeed in dragging one of the fighters into the portal
You and Eydr rescue both of them
The battle-crazed imps catch and tickle Eydr AND you
153332.content:
No sooner have you poked around the corner than Eydr frantically pushes you both back behind the cover of the wall, pressing a finger over your lips.

"By the Light!" she whispers, "Trouble up ahead! Stay alert, human." She peers back around the alley's wall, then motions for you to look again when she deems it safe. You bend forward, careful not to jostle any loose stones or bump into Eydr while looking.

The area in front of you is a small courtyard, wider than the streets or alleys but nothing particularly grand. The ground is barren save for the remains of some old crates and a wagon, smashed in the battle between Heaven and Hell. In the yard you quickly spot the two warriors of heaven locked in a battle against a group of demons, a fight in which they seem severely outmatched. One, a male, has a white robe and hood on and clutches an arcane staff, wildly blasting at the enemy. The second patrol member is a woman, clad in a shiny, glass-like armor over her chest, arms, and legs as well as a winged helmet. She holds a double-bladed axe in one hand, while her other hand glows, creating a golden magical shield that moves with her arm and seems to ward off the demons.

Despite the situation, Eydr chuckles. "A priest and a paladin fighting side by side...they must not have chosen this. Completely different styles of fighting," she muses. "Must be an ambush. And to happen so close to our perimeter...We need to make our move soon."

You carefully take note of the information about where Heaven's territory is, so you can send it back to your succubus captor later. Then you look back to the battleground. The fiends assaulting the pair of warriors are clearly imps: little demons about three feet tall, with red skin, pointed tails, and feminine features. While they only have sharp claws and their dexterity, they make up in numbers what they lack in strength. The group of about ten imps darts in and out at the priest and paladin, taunting, giggling, and slashing accurately with their claws.

Though a few dark, powdery smudges mark the spots where several imps were vanquished, you can see they've worn down the outmatched servants of good. The priest's robe is in tatters, and the paladin's armor has been removed in several strategic places by the claws of the imps. As the two of you watch, the imps finally overcome the exhausted fighters. Half of them pounce on the priest, laughing as they dig their claws into his unarmored body. He tries to crawl away, but they stick fingers into his belly and trip him up with their tails, then roughly pin him to the ground as they poke his sides, lick his soles, and stick enterprising fingers down his pants, reducing him to a wriggling, red-faced ball of laughter.

The paladin hardly fares any better. She slashes with her axe, reducing one imp to a puff of dust, but is set upon by four more. One creeps around her magical shield and scrapes her nails across the paladin lady's armpit, causing her to break concentration. The shield dissipates, and the demons immediately set upon her and give her the same treatment they're giving the priest, furiously tickling her exposed thighs, neck, and ribs where the armor is ripped off. Before long both heavenly warriors are tired out to the point of near immobility, but the imps keep teasing and tickling.

You watch the savage, unrelenting tickling going on, and it makes you begin to wonder if the mark the succubus put on you protects you from demonic tickling or merely tells them you're on their side.

Suddenly a glowing, shimmering portal appears by a wall nearer to you and Eydr, and you can swear you hear faint laughing sounds from it. You're not 100% sure where it leads, but you can bet it's straight into Hell controlled territory. "Damn! That must be the way they got so close to our borders. They must be using powerful magic to override the protective spell we have in this area." says Eydr.

The two of you then look over to the priest and paladin. The imps are dragging their still laughing, feebly struggling bodies towards the open portal!

"We have to act now!" Eydr whispers, and tosses you a long dagger from her belt as she draws her own sword. Remembering your job to collect information, you decide not to drive it into her back then and there.

The two of you charge into open view of the imps.
153332.title: A minor skirmish breaking out between both sides

choices: Investigate the inn just a few blocks down with Vialle
Follow Eydr to find the person responsible for the portal
The three of you head back to heaven's main camp for now
1533321.content:
Stepping forward into the fight, both Edyr and you quickly got to work, slashing and trying to strike at the pesky imps attacking the brunette’s comrades. As a few more of them vanished into a puff of smoke, they finally take notice of the both of you, grinning as they knew immediately what to do. As you both got closer to where the paladin and sorcerer was, two of the imps from both of the downed people detached themselves, quickly flying over to you and Edyr. As the Valkyrie tried to swing her sword at the annoying creatures, both of them dipped into the openings in her armor. Before long, you could hear giggling coming from inside her clothes as the former barely held onto her sword, clutching at her sides in laughter. “G-Get out from there! Stop it, don’t tickle me!”

Gulping as another pair of imps came over to where you were, one of them sat on your shoulder, whispering into your ear. “Hey human, we know that you have the mark of the temptress on you, so we won’t tickle you. Since you’re with them, we’re guessing you’re going undercover.” Nodding, both of the imps giggled the other one flew to your belly, her hands just inches away from your tummy. “Although, it would be a little bit suspicious if we didn’t tickle you, so try to play along!” Getting to hint, you wildly but carefully flail about, faking your laughter as the other imp continued to make a show of tickling you, even though her hands or fingers didn’t come into contact with you all the while.

Hearing a loud boyish laughter erupting into the air again, you turned to the side. Feeling pity for the man, you saw now that the three remaining imps that had remained with him were now trying to get him to go through the portal, the lower half of his body already inside. However, even as they poked and prodded along the length of his upper body, his hands remained clamped onto a nearby lamppost, true terror in his eyes as he knew what would happen if he let go. As they all let out a sigh, the three mischievous creatures decided to change their tactics, a wicked smile on all of their faces at their new plan. As one of the imps sat down on his shoulders to whisper something to his ear, the other two entered the portal. As the imp finish speaking with a giggle, a crimson blush appeared on his cheeks.

“W-Wait! You can’t do that! If you do-!! Urrk!” Gasping as he felt his rob being tugged on from the other end, the sorcerer burst into giggles again. “Don’t touch m-me! Not down there! It tickles like hell!” As his laughter kicked up another notch, the imp on his shoulder resumed her verbal teasing, her legs swinging daintily. “Oh but mister, you haven’t seen what pleasure we can bring you in hell yet. Let us give you a taste of what is to come.” At that moment, moans started to become intermixed with his giggles as his face became even more flushed than what it was before. Fingers finally slipping free from its hold, his whole body went into the portal, his laughter growing softer with every second.

As the pixies made a move to return through the portal as well, their deed being done, one of them whispered again in your ear before going through. “If you need any help, go to the inn just down the street. One of our allies is hidden there, waiting for any helpless victims. See you for now!” Wings just barely tickling your ear as she left you, you heard Eydr heave a sigh of relief at the momentary break from the tickling. However, even as the imps returned through the portal, the latter did not close, remaining open as dark red magic pooled in a fog around it.

“For now, this portal takes priority. There must be someone or something that’s powering this portal, allowing those hellspawn to enter in our domain. We must find what it is, and stop it immediately before more of those fiendish creature’s arrive!” Nodding your head as you watched both Eydr and the paladin getting up; you see the latter give both of you a nod of the head as well. “Well said, sister-in-arms. I am Vialle. As you can see, we were ambushed and being caught off guard, were swiftly defeated. However, we must not let our ally’s sacrifice be in vain. We should press on and defeat more of these hellish beings!” Opening your mouth, you suggested to…
1533321.title: The imps succeed in dragging one of the fighter...

choices: A lone high-succubus, eyes closed in concentration.
An dark red orb, sitting on a pedastel.
A couple of angels tied up.
15333212.content:
“I guess this is where we part ways then. Vialle, you head back to the main camp to report on what has happened here. This mortal and I will find the source of the portal, and shut it down before any other intruders appear deep inside our ranks. If such a power was allowed to run rampant during the war… We might find ourselves flanked and getting nasty surprises much more than we would like it.” As the female paladin gave a salute, straightening her gear before walking in the separate direction from where Eydr was beckoning you to follow her, you could only grimace at the missed opportunity to discover where the heaven’s main quarters were located at. If you had refused to follow Eydr, it might have proven a tad too suspicious.

Jogging up to where the Valkyrie was walking briskly, you still had a question in your mind. “But how are we going to find where whoever is creating the portal is? For all we know, they could be all the way at hell’s side of the battlefield, and no way are we going there!” Pausing for a minute to take out something from a pouch on her waist, she handed it over to you. Curiously looking at the new object in your hand, you realize that it was just a plain lens, albeit that you could probably fence this off for a pretty penny judging from the intricate engravings and patterns on the metalwork frame.

“Hold it up to the light and look at the portal. This is an ‘eye of osiris’, one of the tools we usually use to see magic ley lines that are invisible to the naked eye. If you point it at the portal, you should be able to trace where the source of its magic is coming from.” True enough, as you looked at where the shimmering crimson construct was through the new lens, you could see a faint red line snaking from it, through where you were walking, all the way to the top of a clock tower at the end of the street. Giving back the lens to Edyr, slight nervousness entered your voice. “If whatever is over there is making the portal, shouldn’t it be with good reason that it should be strong?”

“Of course, if that were the case we would have to just have to hope for the best and catch them off guard. However, if it was just an object that was the thing that’s the source of power opening the portal, we might be able to take down whoever is guarding it. Just in case, stay back and let me handle it.” Proudly opening the double doors to the building, the pitch black and eerily silent interior greeted you both. As the old wooden stairs creaked with every step the both of you took, the both of you ascended to the third floor, one last floor before the attic of the clock tower. Even as you stood before the stairs leading up, you could feel the heavy aura of powerful magic in the atmosphere. One glance at Edyr also told you that she felt it, a bead of cold sweat sliding down her face.

“W-Well then, we can’t keep waiting forever. You still have that dagger I gave you right?” Fingering the handle of the weapon by your waist, you nodded, confirming that it was there. “Alright, on my mark, we go in. Three… Two… One…” Climbing the final steps, the both of you encountered…
15333212.title: Follow Eydr to find the person responsible for ...

choices: Lilith loses her concentration and breaks the spell
Heaven's forces have come to help!
153332121.content:
With only a few rays of light shining down from the alcoves into the dusty attic, the sound of quiet grinding of gears filled both your ears from above, the mechanisms of the clock tower working tirelessly away to move the massive timepiece displayed at the top of the building. Gazing in awe at the internal structure of this relatively undamaged building, you almost bumped into Eydr who had abruptly stopped in front of you.

Quietly pointing to the center of the musky room, the Valkyrie directed your attention to where a ritual was being held, a glowing purple circle with a star and pentagram design in the center of four candle stands, laid out in four opposite corners. In the center of it, a woman with fiery red hair could be seen sitting down, the sight of her naked back and lack of clothes except for a tiny piece of cloth attached to strings all that is covering her below her waist already telling you which side she was probably on. Staying far enough from the tail which started from her rear, close inspection told you that the ‘tail’ was in fact a snake, its head hissing softly at you as its slitted pupils kept a constant gaze on you.

As both Eydr and you slowly walked in front of her, the both of you could see that her eyes were in fact closed, her body in the typical meditation poses of the lotus position that monks from the highlands could be seen doing, the pair of wings made purely from flames on her back twitching as she sensed the presence of people around her. Lit up by the flickering flames on the candles, her beautiful face didn’t as much move a muscle; even you could tell it was taking her quite the effort to supply power to the portal. Aiming the blade of her sword at the others neck, Edyr was about to swing when the other woman suddenly spoke up, one eye opened in humor, her tone remaining neutral. “I wouldn’t do that if I were you, unless you know not the name of Lilith, head of one of the thirteen clans of succubi.”

Clicking her tongue in annoyance, you watched in surprise as Edyr halted just inches away from the other’s exposed nape before reluctantly sheathing her sword. Pulling you back as she lowered her voice so as not to be heard by the still concentrating succubus, you questioned the Valkyrie at her strange behavior, still keeping up with your pretense. “Hey, why did you stop? If you had swung your sword, she would have been finished there and then!”

“Quiet, human. I’ve heard from my sisters of the tales of those that had happened to face that particular succubus on the battlefield. Along with her extraordinary magic prowess, that snake behind her back will automatically bite at anyone that tries to attack her with any type of physical attack, its poison rendering them unable to move and eventually succumb into a state of prolonged sleep, where she can finish them off at her leisure. We must be cautious of directly attacking her, lest we get bitten before we’re able to take her out.” Biting her thumb, Edyr continued to think, trying to find her weakness.

“I’ve heard that warriors had managed to lay a hand on her, before being blasted away by her magic. In that case, if we don’t have the intention of bringing harm to her, we could possibly get close to her. But then what… All we have are our bare hands… Our bare… hands… Hmm… This could actually work…” A mischievous smile creeping up on her lips, Edyr whispered to you her idea, your eyes opening wide at what she was about to make you do.

Once the Valkyrie had made sure that you had gotten her plan in mind, both Edyr and you sat in behind and in front of the still form of the succubus respectively. As the red-head opened her eyes once again in curiosity, you mouthed the words ‘I’m sorry’ to her before grabbing her foot, tracing one finger up and down her arches. Seeing her eye widen before closing shut in concentration, you were relieved to see that the snake, which had taken an interest in you, has yet to bite you, a sign that tickling was not counted as a form of physical harm. Continuing to stroke your fingers as slow as you could across her soles, a pair of hands made their way to her sides, poking the succubus’ soft skin before giving them a few experimental squeezes. “Coochie coo… Looks like someone can’t stop us from tickling her poor ticklish skin. It would be so easy for you to just get up and swat us away like flies… But you can’t do that, can you? Tickle tickle!”

As Edyr continued whispering soft teases into Lilith’s ear, you could see what Eydr could not, a soft smile stretching itself across her once-still beautiful façade. Grimacing and hoping that she wouldn’t hurt you if kept the tickling to a minimum; you softly scratched a few fingers into her toes as they started to wiggle a bit, her body language telling you that it tickled more than she had let on. However, Eydr had no such inhibitions as she relentlessly grabbed at the red-head’s curvy hips, randomly alternating between extremely and soft kneading. Determined not to fail in her task, even you could see the slight smile that Lilith had on turn into a wide grin as her self-control slowly broke down inside her mind.

Hoping that you could stop Edyr before Lilith actually starts to laugh, you try to appeal to the Valkyrie. “Don’t you think we should stop soon? It doesn’t look like she’s gonna laugh from this.” Humming to herself as she plucked two flaming feathers from the succubus’ fiery wings Edyr grinned to herself. “Let’s see if she can contain her giggles after I do this!” Fluttering the feathery fronds along the undersides of Lilith’s bare chest, you could see tears of mirth welling up in the corners of her eyes. After a few tense seconds passed…

1533321213.content:
The sound of footsteps directed both your attention and as well as Edyr’s to the stairwell, giving Lilith the much needed break she needed as the succubus let out a small sigh of relief under her breath. However, her monetary joy and your own soon turned into dismay as the Valkyrie exclaimed in delight. “My sisters, you have found us! Help us in ridding this filthy succubus! She’s the one who’s been opening up portals in our domain!”

As you notice the two other Valkyries, both looking absolutely stunning by mortal standards, enter the attic as well, they were dressed in the same garb as Edyr with their only difference being their hair, one a long haired blonde while the other had similarly long haired dyed auburn and brown. As they took up their places around the succubus, following their fellow Valkyrie's lead, the blonde spoke up, already smiling at being presented with the opportunity to defeat a denizen of hell. “So sister, what have we here? Are my eyes not deceiving me, that the being in front of us is indeed the infamous Lilith of the thirteen clans?”

“Right you are, sister. Even though I felt that we didn’t need any help, this mortal here advised me to contact you in the possibility that we found something dangerous.” Showing off a blue mana crystal from a pouch in her waist, you assumed that was what Edyr had used to communicate with the other Valkyrie's, already regretting having telling her to do so in the first place. “Like the rumors have said, we were unable to find a way to stop her without that snake on her tail from biting us. However, after fighting against one of Hell’s spawn, I realized that perhaps they aren’t so protected against their own types of pleasures. Allow me to demonstrate."

Stretching out one hand towards Lilith, both of the other Valkyries had been prepared to stop Edyr for the fear of being stung. However, as Edyr started to softly trace her finger up and down the frozen succubus’ sides without the snake beside her taking any action other than lazily staring at her, the look in their eyes turned from wariness to mischievousness as a smile also appeared on their lips, apparently getting the idea. Feeling some suddenly giving your shoulder a hard shove, you gasp as the blonde Valkyrie took your place. “Move mortal, I’ll take over from here. Time to show you what we sisters of Athena are can do.”

As the tickling resumed once more, you could see that this time they weren’t holding anything back, tormenting Lilith from the start with thirty individual wiggling digits. As the blonde raked her nails up and down their victim’s arches and toes as if she were playing a melodious harp, her raven-haired partner had taken up a position on Lilith’s lap, her chest almost touching the succubus’ own as her hands moved fluidly across the latter’s smooth belly, playfully pinching her exposed sides and ribs every once in a while. Lastly, your brunette companion still kept up with teasing the surface of the succubus’ orbs with her own ticklish feathers, brushing and swiping their length along the sides of her barely jiggling chest, occasionally rubbing their fronds against the circumference of the globes.

“Does it tickle in between your toes, succubus? How about these silky arches of yours? Not so mighty anymore, aren’t you? Kitchy Kitchy Koo!”

“Where are you most ticklish on this lithe body of yours, Lilith? Don’t want to tell us? Oh, we’ll make you talk!”

“Even though you’re not laughing for now, even I can tell these boobies are ticklish! Look at how they just want to move away from your own ticklish feathers! Tickle tickle tickle!"

Even though she was a high succubus, even they too had their limits as she was unable to hold her laughter back for any longer, the sound of her guffaws and giggles bursting out like a rushing stream. “I-I said… S-Stop it… Stop it right no-ahahahahAHAHHAAAHAA! Damn you Va-aaAHAHAHHALKYRIES! WHEN I GET OUT OF HERE-EHEHEHEHEEE, I’LL MAKE YOU ALL SCREAM WITH LAHAHHAHHAAUGHTER! GAHAHAHAHAHAAAA!” Still dedicated to holding up the portal, Lilith somehow still managed to power the spell amidst her raucous and frenzied laughter, her own body straining itself by sheer force of will to not move from her position. Not one to give up so easily, the Valkyrie’s continued to tickle the lone succubus, knowing that she would break sooner or later.

Deciding that this might be your last chances to be in Lilith’s good graces, you…

15333212132.content:
Realizing that the succubus was about to break under the combined tickling, you knew you had to act fast. Feeling the magic of the ritual that Lilith was holding still thick in the air, the thought of dark magic entered your mind as the symbol on your hand glowed purple, a sign that it was activating. Making sure that you kept out of the lines of sight of the Valkyrie’s distracted by their tickling task, you went to each of them, waving your hand slowly above their heads as the magic took over, going along with your desire…

************

“Don’t you think that she’s taking some time to break, sisters? She’s a lot tougher than she looks, heheheeee!”

“But that look on her face-ahahahahaaa! That large grin of hers is telling me she’s about to break into laughter any second now!”

“I’m having so much fun tickling this poor succubus, I think I might just pass out in giggles, heeehehehhahahaa!”

“You know what; I think I might just pass out laughing too! HahahahAHAhahaha!”

As the Edyr and the Valkyries giggled and chuckled amongst themselves as their fingers never stopped exploring their victim’s silky smooth skin, not once did they ever wonder why was it taking so long for Lilith to break, nor why were they suddenly bursting out into giggles and laughter occasionally for no apparent reason…

*************

“What a creative plan, mortal. I would have never thought to use illusion magic’s like that.” Giving a smug grin of approval, both you and Lilith watched the scene unfold besides the sitting succubus, where the Valkyries had unknowingly left their victim. Now mistakenly treating a wooden peg coat as the succubus’s substitution as they were trapped in your illusion granted to them by the powers of the mark in your hand, they had retained their original positions. Instead of tickling demonic flesh however, their digits constantly teased each other’s skin, none of them wiser of the difference.

Feeling a tad sorry for Edyr, who was hysterically laughing as the brown-haired Valkyrie fluttered her fingers across the former’s ticklish ribs, you knew that if you were to disobey your temporary demonic masters a much worse fate would have befallen you until they got tired of you, which might be all eternity.

Noticing that you were fidgeting nervously, Lilith’s lips curled into a smile. “Don’t worry, human. Even though I do absolutely hate being tickled, I understand your circumstances. However, do not expect the rest of my sisters to be as kind as me. For now head west, where another of my fellow sisters is in battle with one of heaven’s warriors.” Clicking her tongue in annoyance Lilith cocked her head to the side. “In fact, I can even hear her screaming for help through our mental link. Always the loudest of us… Go now human, and don’t worry. I’ll make sure to keep these Valkyries busy for a looong time…”

Casting one last pitying look at Edyr, you parted ways with her as you headed down the stairs of the attic, exiting the building. About to head down the streets to the west…

153332121322.content:
Arriving at an empty plaza devoid of people with only discarded sword and shields telling the tale that a battle had taken place here, you wonder if Lilith had gotten her information correct. Perhaps she had sent you off on a wild goose chase?

About to leave, you hear a snarling voice call out to you atop some boxes. “Human, I know you have been marked. Come over and help me, mortal, or I’ll flay you alive!” Slowly turning around, expecting to come face to face with an similarly imposing succubus such as the one you met before, or someone as beautiful as Lilith, a blank look appeared on your face as you see only the head of a succubus on top of the wooden box with only one horn protruding out from under her hair, the other horn cut at its stump, by who-knows-what, hidden underneath her dark hair.

Still caught by surprise at seeing a talking head, an impatient look quickly appeared on her face. “Bow before me mortal, for I am Sarixis of the thirteen clans of succubi, bearer of the cursed tongue!” Scratching your head, you wondered how you were going to tackle this. “Uhmm… My apologies Lady Sarixis, but if I may ask… What happened to the rest of your body?”

Letting out a prideful ‘hmph’, Sarixis somehow managed to look down at you even as hard as it may be for just a talking head. “That damned paladin and her holy sword ‘Rasheed’… She managed to catch me off guard and use that damnable sword’s power which allows its user to slice anything into pieces while keeping them alive. By the time I had realized what had happened, she had broken my body into parts, taking some of them back with her, laughing as she said wanted to ‘play’ with them. The nerve of her…”

Trying to get Sarixis to calm down, you proposed an idea. “So if we somehow manage to get all the pieces of your body together again, perhaps you would be whole?”

“Yes, that would most likely happen. However, since I was stuck here as just a talking head, I couldn’t see where the rest of my body had been taken to. I only know that they’re still close by. Now carry me human, I’ll guide you to where I think they are. After that, I'll torture that paladin for 10 ”

Shrugging your shoulders in defeat, you gently carried Sarixis’ head in the crook of one arm as she directed you to head…
153332121322.title: You found where the battle had taken place

1533321213222.content:
“First, let’s get my arms back. I need those to strangle any paladins we might find.” Nodding nervously, you followed Sarixis’ cues. As much as a disembodied head could turn, you found yourself guided down winding alleyways by the occasional threats and head tilts. Eventually, you opened the door to a musky and empty bar.

“This is the place?” With the only light shining through the cracked windows, you could barely make out the worn-out furniture its previous owners had left in place.

“Make no mistake, mortal. I can sense my limbs nearby.”

“That would be correct. Sadly, you won’t live to use them.” A flash of silver. That was all that appeared from the corner of your eye before your body instinctively ducked into a roll. From the shadows behind a counter, a female silhouette emerged. With the only defining features being her cold face hiding beneath a mouth mask, her long black hair tied in a ponytail only brought one two words to your mind: Hired Kunoichi.

“How pertinent. To have dodged my kunai’s… You must be have been chosen as well.” Raising up her right hand, you noticed a glowing white mark pulsating under her fingerless gloves. Bringing up your own, you see her narrowing her eyes. Before she could speak, however, a scream echoed in the room. “YOU! I know you’re hiding parts of my body! Give them back to me now, mortal, and you’ll only be suffering for ten centuries under my wrath!”

“Hoh? By ‘parts’, might you be referring to this?” The other female kicked an object from behind the counter before placing her foot atop it. From the alabaster skin to the small pieces of fabric covering the object’s chest, Sarixis gritted her teeth at the sight of her upper body. While it had been cleanly sliced around her neck and ribs, neither her arms nor the rest of her body was anywhere nearby.

“You bitch! Hand over my body, or I’ll-!”

“You’ll what, Miss Succubus? Laugh for me?” Placing the glowing mark on her hand over the disembodied part’s ribs, bright light flared for a few seconds. In the same instant, your host screeched out in hysterics, laughter becoming intermixed with her cursing. When the light faded, you could almost feel the smirk on the stranger’s lips at Sarixis’ heavy breathing. “That was just a taste of what my benefactor’s powers are capable of. While I hadn’t been too keen on receiving this… Perhaps it could be a useful tool in future missions.”

Watching your adversary admire her own mark, you gulped. You barely even had an idea what yours was truly capable of. What did the succubus who gave you it said? Something about coiled rope...?

Desperately racking your mind for the memory, you heard your opponent crudely kick aside the body part underneath her feet. “We kunoichi don’t usually reveal our names, as our victims won’t live to remember them. An exception can be made however, seeing as how these aren’t usual circumstances. My name is Kugumi. Carve this name into your mind, mercenary.”

“Don’t worry.” You gently set Sarixis’ head onto a table, ignoring the stream of expletives from her lips at the kunoichi’s fate. “That first hit just caught me off-guard. Let’s see you try it again!”

“I don’t need to.” Feeling chills as she said that, her fingers easily toyed with a kunai. “That first strike was all I needed. Fall for me.”

In the next moment, you felt your knees hitting the floor. It was almost as if gravity had been excessively increased for you. Your arms could barely even support your weight when you lurched forward, much less do anything as Kugumi closed the distance. “Is this your mark’s ability!?”

“That is correct.” Giving your side a few pokes, you grunted as your elbows gave way, leaving you unable to move on the ground. “With every touch from my weapons or fingers, I can ‘inflict’ an action onto anything, or anyone. For example… Spread your arms.”

Feeling her fingers whisk along your shoulders, a grunt escaped your mouth when you felt your limbs following her every command. “Is that all you can do? Forcing people into weird poses?”

“Of course not. Electrify.” Kugumi said, her weight pressing down on your back. Grabbing your hips with her hands, you let out an unnatural shriek at the electric-like tickles coming from that area. By the time she released her fingers, you were already gasping in the same way Sarixis was.

“Huff… What… was that?”

“Just a taste of what I can do. Raise your arms.” You felt another soft touch, before your body was forced to obey. A lone finger gently scratched in your underarms, your lips spreading in a ticklish grimace. “Such vulnerability. Come to me, Feathers.”

Feeling a finger tapping into your other hollow, snickers snuck their way through your mouth at the sensation of a dozen plumy feathers. Caressing you even through your shirt, it was insanity how two fingers were almost enough to break you out into giggles.

“Such tenacity. I suppose I should try something more effective to someone associated with demons.” Kugumi thought aloud to herself. You sucked in your belly when you felt ten fingers lightly planting themselves there, her next words almost a whisper. “Searing Light.”

“Waaahhahahahhaaaat is this?! Geehehheheheet out of my clotheeeheheheeehees!” You howled with laughter at the burning, ticklish feelings coming from her fingertips. It was certainly an apt description, ‘Searing Light’. To denizens of hell, it must have felt as if their nerves were seared with the memory of unfelt ticklishness. “Thehehheheees isn’t fahahhahaaair!”

“Have you ever heard of a kunoichi playing fair?” When the light faded, you saw your tormentor waving a stiff, purple feather in front of your immobile head. You could almost feel her cheeky grin as she lightly tickled your neck and nose, causing your face to scrunch up. “You can barely even hold up against a feather. I almost feel sorry for your choice. However, we each merely picked a side. I just happened to pick the winning one.”

With your eyes catching the mark on her hand glowing ever more brightly…

153332123323.content:
As both the giggling succubi headed towards Edyr to have their share of fun, the Vampire walked over to you, one hand cupped underneath your chin as you didn't dare to move.

"Oh relax mortal, I can see the mark that she put on you. I'm not going to harm you or anything." Letting out a breath you held in unconsciously, you see her give you a sly grin, her canines fully visible. "We are grateful that you have alerted us to these intruders. In fact, you have arrived at just the opportune time. We have need of someone of your... harmless looking traits."

As a mirror the size of her palm appeared in her hand in a puff of smoke, she held it out to you, beckoning you to take it. "You see, my flock and I are recently having trouble with some disciples of Artemis and their cunning long-distance fighting tactics. What's more, their bows and arrows are quite the hindrance against us creatures that have flight. I know that you have the few magics that the succubus have given you, but please, take this."

As you were about to ask the question of what was the mirror's purpose, as if reading your mind, the Vampire gave a haughty laugh. "That my dear, is a trans-dimensional mirror, capable of transporting one person into it, allowing you to keep them in it for all eternity, if you so choose it. It also has the ability for anyone outside to touch anything inside, but not the other way around."

As the gears clicked in your head, your eyes widened as you knew your mission just got harder. "You want me to trap their leader inside this mirror?"

Nodding, the second benefactor licked her lips, already eyeing the Valkyrie who was still hysterically laughing due to the professional administrations of the additional succubi. "In a nutshell, yes. Don't worry, you should be able to find her easily. With all the disturbance we'ed caused here, no doubt she'll come to investigate. All you need to know is that she has aqua blue hair, that should help you easily find her. Now go. I have Valkyrie to feast on..."

Quickly climbing down the steps before she changed her mind, you kept the mirror in your pocket, careful not to drop it. As you exited the building, you started to see people approaching this street!

If she weren't the person you had to put in the mirror, you would have been stunned by the beauty of such a woman.

I was just walking outside the city, minding my own business when she kidnapped me, taking me with her! When you came, she left me and turned around that corner!”

“You have sharp eyes, human. Fret not, I, Yvette, leader of the disciples of Artemis shall aid you. If we’re fast, we might be able to catch the perpetrator. Come, follow me. I’ll keep you safe from those demons.” Already un-slinging her bow from her shoulders and nocking an arrow onto it, she ducked into the narrow passage, ready to shoot at anything that might resemble a demon. Finding the alleyway empty however, a perplexed look appeared on her face. “Human, didn’t you say she went this way? She couldn’t have possibly disappeared into thin air… Human?” Turning her head around to see where you went…
