As the pixies took notice of the new target, it wasn’t long before a few of them flew over, giggling as they fluttered their wings into each of the trapped archer’s hollows, both of them already collapsing into hysterics.

“We have to help them, before our forces are all turned into laughing victims!” Taking just a few steps forward, glowing purple chains suddenly shot out, wrapping around the Valkyrie’s wrist. Grunting as she tugged against it, even more chains flew out from an outstretched hand, its owner smirking as she continued to chant, even more magical chains shooting out. Barely able to keep up by slashing the oncoming purple chains with her steel sword…
1533321233231133321.title: "Fight to the last person!"

choices: You need to know what else is happening in this war."
You should get back to work."
15333212332311333212.content:
The tide of battle was now well in Hell's favour. The ranks of Heaven were crumbling thanks to the assault from the Pixies and Magic Users, too sensitive to withstand the wicked attacks on their ticklish bodies. You help finalise it by reaching and digging your hands into Diana's underarms, tickling the smooth skin as she lets out a shriek of surprise and dismay from the fatal distraction. Dropping her sword from shock, the Valkyrie is open to the chains shooting out and grabbing the rest of her limbs, stretching her body to being as vulnerable as possible.

With Diana unable to defend herself, you continue tickling her, her breastplate leaving her underarms, hips and a thin sliver of her midriff open to a tickle attack, your fingers wiggling over these spots and making her burst into helpless laughter, yanking at her chains helplessly as she spluttered demands to be let go. Her words were to only get worse as you walk around and look her in the eye, the Valkyrie's face frozen in shock as she realises that she was been betrayed "YoouuuOOHOOOHAAHAHAHHAAAA!!" She cried out, trying to curse you, but stopping short as your hands squeeze her bare thighs and make her throw back her head in ticklish torment.

The rest of Heaven's forces were doing just as badly as the last of the Disciples were being taken down by the Naga and Pixie assault while the Valkyries and Warriors were overwhelmed without their support and sheer numbers. They were tackled down to the ground and disarmed, fingers wiggling into their skin and making them burst into laughter, weakening their resistance while sorceresses and warlocks used their dark arts to trap their limbs to prevent any chance of them fighting back. The Godly fighters were soon stripped and humiliated as their naked bodies were on display, being played with by the hordes of Hell in their victory.

Leaving the Disciples of Artemis to the Pixies and a particularly eager Warlock, the Naga approaches you and Diana, grinning hungrily as she reaches over and rips off the breastplate of the Valkyrie, her skirt soon following and leaving the former proud commander in some rather plain underwear, causing her to go bright red. The Naga laughed at such modesty and leaned into Diana's ear, taking on a seductive tone as her hands played with the naked skin idly, teasing the Valkyrie's buttocks and with with long, idle strokes that made her stutter and giggle "Aww, don't worry, we'll have much more appealing clothing for you when one of Hell's nobles take you on as their personal pet."

Diana let out a cry of pure horror at this, soon descending into laughter as the Naga's long nails dug into her cute rear, gossing and squeezing it as Diana went a deep red and screamed in ticklish agony. Her hair whipped back and forth while her navel was licked and teased by the Naga's long, rough tongue in a way that made Diana's scream reach new heights, the fingers scribbling into her armpits just adding a fresh piece of woe onto her torment.

You pull away from Diana to look around the battlefield, Heaven's forces now all captured and being played with in many wicked ways. The Disciplces of Artemis had all been lined up besides one another, a soceress conjuring up a long set of stocks with their feet poking out of the holes. Each of the archers howled with laughter as their long, shapely feet were teased and tickled relentlessly by the horde around them, tongues, fingers and feathers all joining in a mass tickle attack. Already, some were begging for it to stop and crying with laughter, their soles and toes subjected to such evil tickle torture that it would be inevitable before they would all be broken in time.

The Succubi who had taken part in the battle also had their fun, selecting a few of the warriors and Valkyries for teasing. Stripping them naked, the beautiful female Demons subjected their victims to long, slow teasing over their bodies, making them gasp with pleasure as long black feather teased over their most sensitive of areas. One male warrior, muscular and powerful, was already letting out a stream of high pitched giggles asa feather teased along his cock and balls, making them twitch as a succubus cooed sweetly into his ear, her hands stroking idly up and down his sides as his arousal and torment only increased.

One such succubus noticed you and used her bat like wings to fly over to your spot, smirking at you as she said "Ah, you're the reason we had this victory so easy. Well, I think...
15333212332311333212.title: You decide to help the Sorceress

choices: You decide to circle around, heading for the building which might house treasure
You decide to infiltrate as a lost human
You decide to infiltrate through the sewers under the bridge
153332123323113332122.content:
"…It’s time you ought to know how the battle is going if you're going to continue being of use to us." Giggling as she waved a hand in the air, a cloud of green mist started to form in the air, an image slowly forming in its center. Absentmindedly rubbing the area where you had been branded, your curiosity was intrigued by the rough map of the town that appeared in the mist

“Even though winning this little battle is a good start for us, those goody two-shoes from heaven have already set up a barricade stopping us from moving further.” Swiping with one finger at the mist, the image took form as the image of an arched-stone bridge came into view, dozens upon dozens of Warriors and Valkyries already taking up a defensive formation on one side of it with their shields raised like a wall to prevent anything from getting across. Behind them, a makeshift encampment could be seen toiling about, angels keeping a watch from above while the Disciples took to the roofs of nearby buildings, acting as both scouts as well as surveillance against Hell’s army.

“Now that’s where you come in! After seeing what you can do today, we had hoped that you could somehow sneak in… Soften them up from the inside, if you get what I’m saying?” Giving you a quick poke to the ribs to make sure you were paying attention, you nodded earnestly, suppressing the urge to grin. Giving you a sultry smile as the mist dissipated, the succubus raised a finger, pointing west.

“If you head down that street, the stone bridge where those heavenly smucks are should be visible. Wade through the waters to get to the other side, infiltrate as a lost human, we don’t care how you do it. Once you’re ready, just send us a signal through the mark on your hand and we’ll start the advance. Just make sure not to get caught, or we might not be able to save you! And I do hate to waste such a ticklish human such as you.” Giving you one last poke before urging you on, you see sexy demoness give you one last wave before heading back to where a male warrior was, constantly being held on the edge of hysterics by another giggling succubus.

Making sure to keep her warning in mind, you headed down the path, leaving the sound of male and female heavenly laughter behind. After a few minutes of quiet walking, thinking to yourself how you had gotten yourself into this mess as an agent of hell, you start to slow down, hugging the walls of an abandoned tavern as you peered around the corner. True enough to what you had seen in the mist, a small army of heaven’s warriors had congregated just beyond the bridge, the only thing you could see from your position was a couple of Warriors and Valkyries standing guard, shields raised towards your direction on the opposite side of the bridge.

Already knowing that your prospects of getting in there and getting out were slim at best, you debated to yourself on what the best course of action would be. Perhaps you could go back to the succubus and hope that she would hand you some small form of punishment at best?

Still in thought, a ray of sunlight reflecting off the glint of metal caught your eye from across the bridge. Squinting your eyes to see what it was, you let out a soft gasp as you see about half a dozen Valkyries and Disciples of Artemis carrying what looked to be heavy chests behind the lines into an abandoned building, the boxes clearly engraved with beautiful gold trimmings and inlays. Could that be the war loot or armory of this small army from Heaven? Already smelling the potential gold you could pinch while completing your mission…
153332123323113332122.title: You need to know what else is happening in this...

choices: Look for weaknesses in Heaven's defences
Investigate the boxes that had been brought in
1533321233231133321222.content:
The need to please your new masters, as well as the chance for plunder, was enough to get you to focus on the task at hand. The forces of Heaven were steadfast in their resistance here, even with the losses they had endured. Despite that, you see a few little signs in the groups that you can see, people looking downcast, talking to the person closest to them and then looking around nervously. It seems that morale is quite low, an excellent chance to undermine it further was in front of you.

Seeing how gullible the forces of Heaven have been so far, you try the direct approach. You rush towards the bridge as if being chased "Help me!" You call out, getting the attention of the forces on the bridge "I need somewhere to hide, please!"

The defenders on the bridge pause, before they stand to one side, allowing you to go through a small gap that was quickly closed after you got through. You had succeeded in your first part of the mission, although there was still much more to come as you saw a tall, muscular woman clad in the armour of a Valkyrie approach you "A non-combatant?" She asked, her voice loud and brash "What are you doing here?"

"My friend came here to help volunteer on your side." You quickly lie "I haven't seen her in days, I had to come and look but almost got grabbed by some Demons. Can I stay with you until I find a way out of here?"

The Valkyrie looked thought the problem over for a moment. While thry were fighting a war and couldn't take in everyone, they had also sworn to protect the defenceless anyway they could. With a sigh, she nodded "Very well, you may go to the barracks to find somewhere to rest while we try to get you out of here. It's down the large street. Do not dawdle."

Giving a nod of your head and saying your thanks, you make your way down the street indicated, catching a few glimpses from the other defenders around you as you try to decide what to do next. The mission you had been given meant you had to take action on some level. You're interrupted in your thoughts by the sound of tortured laughter. It's very faint and far into the distance, but you can just make it out.

It seemed that you had a choice in front of you. After some musing, you decide to...
1533321233231133321222.title: You decide to infiltrate as a lost human

choices: You bump into the second chest which turned out to be a mimic!
You hid in one of the chests, hoping for them not to find you!
You managed to find a mysterious relic in the closest chest!
15333212332311333212222.content:
Taking care that no one was actively watching you anymore, you feigned walking down the street towards the barracks before opening the door to the building where you saw the entourage of Valkyries and Disciples carrying the chests into, slipping in before quietly shutting the door behind you.

Risking a glance at the window to make sure that nobody was following you, you heaved a sigh of relief at the successful infiltration. After a few seconds of getting used to the slight darkness of the room, your eyes glinted with greed, the sight of about a dozen or so treasure chests lined up in a haphazard manner lying in front of you enough to send you into a giddy daze at how much treasure and gold all of them could possible contain.

Walking closer, you trace your hand over the covers of the nearest chest, your heart nearly stopping as the sensation of cool metal already told you that the shiny trimmings lining the boxes were actually real gold trimmings. From just a rough estimate, if you could even manage to sell these chests, or even just the components making them, you would have enough money to comfortably live ten years of your life in peace without the need for anymore bounty hunter work.

Opening one of the many treasure chests, the sparkle of coins reflected well in your eyes even in the dimness of the room, several hundred, maybe even thousands of gold and silver coins lining the insides of the chest, almost like a river of metal inside the container. Grabbing a handful of it, a soft ‘ah’ escaped your lips as you took in the tinkling sound of coins slowly falling back into the chest, confirming what you were seeing wasn’t just an illusion.

As you start to close the first chest however, you remember what another of your fellow bounty hunters had informed you in a tale over a drink in a faraway bar. “Aye, don’t let chests full of gold fool you. I had the misfortune of running into a mimic the other day. Stole my sword, did she. Mimics love metal, so keep your gold away from them. Actually, just keep away from them, period. From what I heard, some of them can manifest as a girl popping out of the box, dragging you into god-knows-where the inside of that chest leads to! I bet my coin that what’s inside is another dimension! Hahaha!”

Closing the lid of the first chest with a sigh at remembering your previous conversation, you were glad that at least the first chest wasn’t a mimic. Moving onto the second chest, your heart almost leapt out of your mouth as the door to the building suddenly creaked open. “Hello, is anybody there? I’m here to confirm the quantity of gold looted from that stronghold we broke into last week…”
15333212332311333212222.title: Investigate the boxes that had been brought in

153332123323113332122222.content:
With more than a little luck, you see a half empty chest nearby and dive into it, wincing at the fact you've basically just jumped onto solid gold. You try to close the lid, but it's too tight for that and a thin opening was left, enough for you to peer out and see what was going on. A small, mousy looking woman dressed in red robes had walked into the treasure room, looking around quizzically. She was quite short with pulled black red hair and a surprisingly curved figure under the robe. The robe design was familiar to you and you recognised her as belonging to The Order of Aid, those who basically handled the logistics of all operations handled by Heaven.

While not imposing, you decided not to risk anything and remain silent as the woman looked around for someone to help her, the sound of the door opening behind her causing her to jump and turn around. She looked relieved when a tall woman stepped in, wearing the few items of clothing that the Warrior class were famous for "Oh, one of you quill-pushers." The warrior commented icily. Walking into the room fully, you could see the woman's bronzed skin, her muscular physique and long, black hair certainly catching the eye. Her piercing eyes gazed at the smaller woman with something approaching contempt "And what're you doing in the treasury?"

Despite your first impressions of the smaller woman, she actually met the Warrior's gaze with one of her own "I am Sister Andea of the Order of Aid. I have every right to be here to catalogue our resources. And what are you doing here?" She countered, looking the Warrior in the eye.

For her part, the Warrior paused before breaking into a grin, evidently impressed by Andrea's nerve "I'm Sondra, Warrior and I came in here once I heard someone lurking about. I was hoping it was some Demon, I'm eager to get into action!"

Giving a wide grin at that, Sondra practically flexed as she grabbed onto the swod hanging from her hip, the thought of combat making her almost giddy. Andrea looked more serious though, frowning a little "Easy to say, but this war's not been going well. We've lost half of the city to Hell's forces and even Yvette has gone missing. If the city is taken, Hell wins this round and we all spend the next century being their tickle toys." Andrea's cheeks flushed a little at that, knowing the cost of losing was a heavy one. Whoever won the Battle over Areindal gained great influence over the world for one hundred years before it started again. Nothing that the forces of Heaven really looked forward to.

Sondra seemed to look past that, merely giving a smirk "Oh, we'll get through this! Word is that Artemis and Athena themselves are going to take part in this war. What does Hell have that can match actual Gods?"

"Well, there are the Arch-Fiends." Andrea countered "Succubi of immense pOOEEEYYY!!" She was cut off suddenly as a finger prodded her belly, proving it to be quite sensitive.

"Ah, you're just worried that you'll spend one hundred years getting your cute, chubby belly tickled, aren't you?" Sondra teased, suddenly pressing into Andrea and tickling her. The Warrior's hands reached down to the belly and sides, clawing at them as she tickled with her powerful fingers. Andrea fell onto a nearby cheat, squealing with laughter as she tried to weakly bat the hands away. Her robe offered little protection from the fingers and Andrea was laughing up a storm as her belly did prove to be sensitive to Sondra's wriggling fingers.

With the two do distracted, it could be time for an escape attempt, if it's worth the risk of being spotted. Alternately, you could either wait it out for them to leave (And enjoy the show) or take advantage of the situation. They both seem to have good information and perhaps a quick interrogation will bring some good results.
153332123323113332122222.title: You hid in one of the chests, hoping for them n...

choices: She believes you and lets you out of the box.
She doesn’t believe you and interrogates you instead!
Someone calls her away, leaving you trapped in the box.
1533321233231133321222222.content:
After a good few minutes of teasing the smaller woman, Sondra gave a hearty laugh as her hands reluctantly detached themselves from Andrea’s midriff, the latter leaning onto a nearby chest as she slowly got her giggles under control. “With how ticklish that belly is, I can see why you’re afraid of being those succubi’s tickle toy! Don’t worry, just focus on your job and leave the heavy lifting to us warriors!” As the sound of a door opening and closing signaled her exit from the building, you give a sigh of relief at not being found out, although you would have loved to eavesdrop more about heaven’s reinforcements.

Peering through your narrow peephole, you see the robed figure let out a sigh of relief herself, glancing around the room to make sure that no one else saw the spectacle before going back to her initial objective, searching around the chests nearest to the back of the room for something as she muttered beneath her breath. “If anyone would tickle that ape, I bet she would melt down into a giggling mess herself… Now let’s see… Where did I put that item list… It should be here somewhere from the previous inspection…”

Scanning the room one last time before making sure that the two of you were the only ones in the treasury, you opened the lid of the chest you were hiding in slowly, gingerly stepping out with one foot before quietly stepping out with the other. Tip-toeing silently towards the unsuspecting aid, the latter had no time to react as you cupped one hand over her mouth and another around her waist, her eyes shooting wide in alarm.

Already feeling her smaller frame struggle against your grip, you thank the stars you had the enhanced strength from the mark of the succubus. Maneuvering her towards the nearest closed chest, you forced the raven-haired woman to double over the lid of the box, your body weighing on her back from above. Already mildly annoyed at having to keep her in check, an evil thought crossed your mind. “Since you have such a sensitive belly, I wonder how ticklish it actually is?”

As the fingers wrapped around her waist started to dig in, your suspicions were correct as you quickly heard muffled giggles coming from her silenced mouth, her struggling increasing two-fold. “Oh ho ho, ticklish there, are we? Tickle tickle tickle!” Running your fingers along the curves of her robe highlighting her hips, another bout of snickers were heard coming from your hand, her own pinned arms trying their best to wriggle free from underneath her body.

“Such a ticklish aid! Did that warrior tickle you like this? Kitchie Koo!” Snickering in your mind as you prodded her naval through her thin robe, you absent-mindedly gave her hips a few squeezes, each squeeze bringing about a new series of muffled giggling. During the struggling however, you failed to notice a sneaky hand free itself from underneath you, quickly and frantically using its new found freedom to skitter across your belly.

Letting out a spurt of laughter yourself at the unexpected attack, a sharp pain registered in your mind as the heel of a boot slamming into your toes soon had you wincing, making you carelessly let go of your quarry. Biting your lip to numb the pain, a kick straight into your abdomen soon had you stumbling backwards, your arms flailing but failing to find balance as you tumbled backwards into the chest you had originally hid in, your bottom once again feeling the hard sensation of gold coins.

Before you could get your bearings together, the sound of creaking wood suddenly sent alarm bells ringing in your head, the light of the room quickly fading away as the lid of the chest slammed down on the stretch of your legs around both your ankles before being weighed down by a catch mechanism, the brunt of it luckily being absorbed by the material of your footwear. Being barely able to see the confines of the chest through the narrow slit of light entering it due to your legs being wedged in, you had another problem now as you could glimpse the shadow of a figure appeared outside the box, the hands on her hips already giving away who and how pissed she was.

“Whoever you are, do you think that hiding in here and having the gall to disrupt the work from one of the Order of Aid would have no dire consequences? I think the answer to that is a definite no.” Feeling your boots getting tugged off your feet for the up tenth time this day, you already guessed what manner of payback she was willing to use on you.

“You didn’t seem that distracted just now when Sondra tickled you, O’Sister of the Ticklish Aid.” Getting a reaction at of her at least with your last jab, a flustered Andrea merely growled before running her sharp nails along both your bare and trapped feet as you fought to keep the snickers in check. Contrary to your assumptions, she was surprisingly skilled at dishing it out, finding a small spot in the center of your arches to dig into with fervor. Before long, your dam of giggles burst free in a torrent of splutters and chuckles, your fists pounding against the gold coins beneath you.


“Not feeling so hot anymore now, huh? Let’s see if a few tickles can cool down your attitude.” Rapidly stroking along the sides of your foot, Andrea took pleasure in seeing your feet wiggle about as you tried to shy away, your soles moving left and right along with her scratching digits. Practically howling with laughter by the time she got to your toes with a feathery end of a quill pen she found, the sensation of the fronds sliding in the sensitive regions of your toes proved too much for your pride to take. “W-Waahahahaait! I’m part of the a-aahhahaaalliance! I promise I won’t tickle you anymore! I promise-eehheheeee!”
1533321233231133321222222.title: Stay Hidden

15333212332311333212222221.content:
If there was something that could be said for the forces of Heaven, it was that they were, by rule of thumb, all incredibly gullible. The tickling stopped as you shouted out your lie. She even opened the chest and looked down at you in a disaproving fashion "If you're with the alliance, why were you hiding?" She asked, showing some brains at least.

"I-I was looking for the barracks and just wandered around." You lie quickly "I sort of saw this place and had a look, the gold caught my attention. You add a bashful tone to your words, hoping that it lends them believability "I was just worried that it would be taken the wrong way with me being down here so I hid. And, well... you do have a cute laugh."

Andrea pursed her lips at that last comment before giving a sigh and standing back, letting out get out of the chest "Well, you should ask for directions next time." She said sternly "If it had been someone like Sondra doing this, I doubt they'd be letting you go any time soon."

You mumble a few apologies and thanks as you get out of the box, grabbing your boots as you know it's best to play things safe for now. Andrea watches you with a keen eye before going on "If you heard the conversation, then you know about Heaven's situation. So I don't want to see you goofing around when work needs to be done."

You nod along, seeing she was made of sterner stuff (Even if she was still helpessly ticklish) than you first though. Realising that you had a wealth of information here, you decide to pounce on the opportunity. You were caught off guard before, but there was a chance you could overwhelm Andrea now. Alternatively, what better way to learn Heaven's weaknesses than playing nice for now and infiltrating the place. Or you could quit while you were ahead and leave before rousing even more suspicion.
15333212332311333212222221.title: She believes you and lets you out of the box.

choices: She notices you and calls for help!
She notices you and beckons you to come in
Outside the door, you accidentally listened in, falling prey to her powers!
153332123323113332122222213.content:
Not willing to bite more than you can chew, you quickly gave your thanks for her mercy before closing the door to the building, leaning on its wooden frame as you let out a sigh of relief at managing to fool one of heaven’s attendants. Taking note of their ‘believing’ and gullible nature, you headed down the street, the sound of periodic laughter catching your attention.

Turning the corner, you saw another large building in the corner of the streets, two Valkyries standing guard at its entrance as laughter came out from the second floor, occasionally starting and stopping for a few minutes. While the sound of people laughing constantly was not a surprise to you anymore, the way the mark of the succubus on your hand was reacting to the magic energies on the second floor did definitely catch your attention. While you could walk away, you had to satisfy your inner curiosity a little at what was happening.

Making sure to act as if you were definitely part of the alliance as you pass the two female guards, both of them stood at constant attention, their eyes not leaving you until you disappeared from their sight. Circling around through the alleyways of the town, you were right on your hunch as you entered through the unguarded back entrance of the building, the soft aroma of perfume tickling your nose as you closed the door softly behind you.

Taking care to not make any creaking sounds of the wooden floorboards of the stairs as you climbed upwards, you took in the pastel colored wallpaper and smell of musky perfume, the two of which already telling you that this building was probably a brothel before the holy war took place. Following the sound of laughter, which was getting louder and clearer every step you took, you finally found yourself arriving behind a white ornate door, its hinge slightly ajar. Praising your ever-present luck, you crouched down at the entrance, peeking inside.

Apart from being surprisingly spartan with only a table with a perfume bottle resting on it serving decoration, a large pink lounging couch and rug were the only other furniture being present in the room. What caught your attention however, were the occupants of the room. Lazily laying on the couch was a blonde woman, the curves of her Chiton dress hugging her figure enticingly as she held a smoking pipe in one hand, inhaling from it before exhaling a cloud of sweet vapor. On the rug, two barely clothed succubi, one with flowing jet black hair while the other with brown hair were giving the woman defiant looks, both of them with a thin sheen of sweat on their bodies.

Taking another smoke of her pipe, the blonde lazily twirled her pipe in one hand, clearly bored. “Have you had enough girls, or would you like another round?”

“We would never give in to you, we’re proud succubi! Like we would ever tell any of you whores of heaven our secre-” Before the succubi with jet black hair could finish her sentence, the blonde merely grinned as she raised her hand, both of the succubi strangely looking at a pink mark on their captor’s hand, similar the purple mark on the top of your hand. Seeing the empty look in their eyes like they were caught in a trance, the blonde smirked. “I was hoping you would say that. I rarely get to hear laughter from succubi while cooped up here.”

Lowering her voice to a husky whisper, you had to strain your ears to hear what she said next. “The next time I click my fingers, the both of you will act like chickens. Now, wake up.” Clapping her hands as the glow from her mark faded, the blank look on the succubi was soon replaced again with one of anger and rage.

“I don’t know what magic you can use, but if you think these ropes can hold us peons of hell, we’ll be happy to teach you a ticklish lesson.” Merely snapping the binds on their wrists with a simple tug, both demonesses advanced slowly on their captor, a triumphant grin on their faces. Merely giving a yawn she snapped her fingers, both the succubi and you were surprised as the former two found their bodies slowly squatting down, their arms folded against their sides imitating chicken wings.

“What have you done to us, you bit-Bwak!”

“If you free us now, I promise you’ll only spend an eternity in our personal tickle hell!”

Soon getting tired of the chicken routine and empty threats that the two seductive women were performing in front of her, you see the blonde raise her hand one more time, the life being sucked out from the other two’s eyes. “I have an excellent idea with all this talk about tickling… You both seem close, so I bet you know a few secrets about each other, wouldn’t you? The next time I snap my fingers, you’ll both tickle the most ticklish spot on the other’s body.”

Letting her hand fall once more as the succubi got their bearings back, still furiously clucking at her, their captor snapped her fingers a second time, a malicious grin on her face at what was about to happen next. A look of pure shock on their faces once more as their bodies refused to obey them, horror soon appeared on the face of the succubi with jet-black hair as she found her feet drawing closer into the open hands of her partner, the other succubi also having a similar look at seeing her partner’s hands draw closer to her chest.

“And now, the coup de grace. Laugh you ticklish succubi, and repent!” Immediately bursting out into giggles as she felt her two sets of manicured nails being deposited on her bare soles, it made it all the worse for the first succubi as her body refused to move away, leaving her with only the option to take the tickles. In just a few seconds, another feminine stream of laughter joined the first, the fluttering sensation of fingertips stroking the sides of her bare chest proving too much for the other succubi to take.

Giggling to herself as well as she looked on at the amusing sight of two of hell’s strongest warriors tickling themselves…
153332123323113332122222213.title: Leave the building

choices: You manage to break out of her control
You were made to divulge your secrets
The succubi were made to gang up on you
1533321233231133321222222133.content:
Pressing your ear on the door, you didn’t notice the mark on your hand give off a faint purple glow as you heard the heavenly woman’s words, nor could you have known that its function was to send a warning sign of danger. “How amusing, seeing you mighty demons broken down into giggly girls. Now, amuse me more. I command the both of you to… pleasure yourselves.”

Horror appearing on their laughing faces as they were forced to obey, the sound of constant cackling soon turned into one of moaning as their hands moved away from each other’s bare bodies to delve into their own loins, one of their hands pulling the tiny piece protecting their nether regions to make room for the other hand. In time, both Succubi were reduced to a moaning mess, their faces flushed with the constant pleasuring that their own skilled hands were causing them.

As your own cheeks blushed crimson at hearing the alluring sounds coming from the other side of the thin door, you found that your own hands had unexpectedly started to move on their own, reaching under your clothes despite your protests. “W-What’s going on! I can’t control my body-!”

Your worst fears of unwittingly falling under her spell coming through, you felt your fingers sensually rubbing yours own nipples, the tiny nubs going hard in just a few seconds under your own tender care. While not as ticklish and stimulating as other areas of your body, it was still enough to fan the flames in your loins to a higher degree as a soft moan slipped out from your mouth before you realized it.

“Do we have an eavesdropping rat? Whoever is listening outside, step in.” Unable to disobey, you felt your body standing up, your feet shuffling yourself into the room to sit down beside to two ecstatic succubi. Embarrassingly, your fingers didn’t stop moving all the while as the blonde quirked an eyebrow at seeing who you were, the moans slipping past your gritted teeth leaving an amused expression on the latter’s face.

“A mortal? And a curious one at that. To have been listening while I was working… Naughty humans like you need to be punished. I’m sure a short session with me should set you on the right track…” Noticing the mark appearing on your hand, she squinted her gaze more closely. "Do my eyes not deceive me? Is that... the mark of a Grand Succubus?"

1551.content:
Happy. Bright and happywas the life of the average citizen of Laufania. The state provided for its citizens and in return, a citizen was always expected to be grateful and smiling. Everything was coloured in bright colours, flowers were blooming and everything was provided by the government. All it asked for in return was that people gave what the state asked for and that they smiled when doing so. And if they didn't, there were ways to get them to smile.

You are currently enjoying a day off from work in the park where everything is, by law, bright and cheerful. You stretch out on a bench, relaxing as the people go by when a commotion is heard from the side. Looking over, you see a young blonde woman burst through the crowd, running in a frenzy and looking panicked. Before you can react to this, you see the reason for her fear, she's being chased by the Jesters. Clad in colourful clothes and make up that had them always smiling, the Jesters were the easiest to spot enforcers of Laufania's government.

The two Jesters were both attractive looking women, one tall with flaming red hair and the other shorter with dark skin that sent out a weighted rope towards the fleeing woman, hitting her around the ankles and making her fall to the floor. The impact caused something to roll out of her hand and land near you, although your attention was taken up elsewhere "N-No! Please don't!" The woman cried out as the Jesters reached her, tying her hands behind her back before quickly stripping her of her clothing, leaving her in her underwear.

"Now, now, you know the rules." One Jester said as she sat down beside the woman's torso and began to dig her fingers into the ribs. Tickling was the way in which the populace was kept in line, the most dreadful tickle torture being handed out for the smallest of infractions. The woman began to laugh as her torso was tickled and the other Jester sat by her feet, holding them under one arm and raking her fingers up and down the trapped soles with her free hand.

The woman screamed with laughter under the dual assault, both Jesters being expert ticklers as they exploited her bare skin with wiggling fingers, one finger dipping into the woman's navel making her scream in ticklish agony as it wiggled around in the spot "Oh, so cute!" The Jester at her feet cried out as she wiggled her fingers over the woman's cute chubby toes "You're going to have so much fun at the Happy Place!"

A shiver went through the crowd as they heard that. The Happy Place was a tall, imposing building where the very worst of the tickle torture went on. Anyone who went in there came back... changed.

As you muse on that briefly, you think over whether you really want to hang around for much longer. You decide to...
1551.title: A citizen in a dystopian society, founded upon ...

choices: An elite government agent is waiting inside for you
You inspect the item you found more closely
15513.content:
You may have gotten this far in life through obedience and fear, but as the object rolls to your feet a flame of anger and frustration with the oppressive government is kindled inside of you. The woman being mercilessly tickled in front of you was just one of dozens of people you'd seen captured by the Jesters and hauled off to one of the mysterious Happy Places, the largest one of which was located only a few miles from you. Stepping out of line for one fateful moment of your life, you reach down and grab the object, which is a few inches long and wrapped in cloth. Before anyone noticed, you crammed it into your jacket pocket, heart racing.

Meanwhile, the Jesters are wrapping up their tickly torment of the woman and hauling her to her feet, but it's clearly hard for her as they repeatedly sneak jabbing fingernails into her exposed underarms and ribs. She's panting hard from her torture and can't use her bound hands to steady herself, but the redhead and the dark skinned woman each clamp down hard on each arm and begin to call in a transport for immediate extraction to the Happy Place. You hoof it away from the scene, the object seeming to throb in your pocket.

After escaping from the park unnoticed through the crowd, you caught the monorail back to your apartment. Intrusive and non-sanctioned thoughts raced through your head, the woman's capture had perhaps sparked a little feeling of rebellion in you. But you were still deathly scared of the regime and the vast resources they had at their disposal to literally tickle the life out of any dissidents.

After a smooth ride and outwardly cheery ride home, you arrive at your neighborhood: a quaint government-created village containing rows of clean and idyllic yet identical homes. Yours was personalized just a little to give it a welcoming feeling, a feeling you craved after today's events and work. And maybe a hot bath was in order...

You arrive in your front yard and go inside.
15513.title: Getting out of your happy place

choices: You are in a jail cell.
You are in an interrogation room.
155131.content:
As you open the door to your house, you are surprised at the sight a tall, yet slender woman, standing a few inches taller than you. She wore a black suit, and held up a badge that had two crossed feathers, indicating that she was one of the government's top agents.

"Hello, [Mr/Ms. Your name], if you don't mind, I'd like to have a little chat with you about a government matter." She said in a stern voice.

Normally, you would co-operate to avoid any trouble, but you realize something's out of the ordinary here; why does a government agent happen to coincidentally appear at my house, just after I do something punishable? You thought, before deciding to make a run for it. When you turn around, you see a black car pull up in the street. You notice the windows of the car roll down, and a gun point out of it.

Next thing you know, you felt something in your neck. As you reach for it, you pull it out and see it's a tranquilizer dart. Before long, you could feel your self becoming drowsy and everything fading away.

As you regain consciousness, you notice...
155131.title: An unexpected visitor.

choices: Brings in a box of tools.
1551312.content:
You look around and see you're seated in a metal chair, that stood behind a small table. You try to move, but notice your hands are cuffed behind your back, and your ankles to the legs of the chair. You try to look around for an indication of where you are, but you get nothing. All you see is the one light in the center of the ceiling, barely illuminating the room, and a mirror on the wall.

Then you hear the sound of footsteps, followed by the door to the room opening. In walked the person you saw at your house; the agent. She takes a seat on the other side of the table. "Hello again." She says giving you a sinister smile.

"The item you picked up... why do you have it?"

You decide to stay silent.

"Nothing to say? Maybe I can make loosen your lips." She says getting out of her chair and walking behind you. You begin to feel her fingers on your belly. She starts by spidering her fingers on top of your mid section, tapping away, already breaking your control. You could immediately feel your helplessness to fight back as unbearable laughter began to rise within you. As she continued her "interrogation" you began squirming in your chair instinctively, when she suddenly stops.

"Ready to talk?" She asks.

Still, you stay quiet.

"Huh, I admire your endurance, but I've just begun..." She whispers into your ear, before she...
1551312.title: You are in an interrogation room.

choices: You tell her a fake story.
You tell her you don't know anything.
You refuse to tell her anything.
15513121.content:
As you started to wear out, you felt a sharp tingle in both of your armpits. You look to your side and see her black painted nails lightly scratching your underarms. You let out a distinct gasp before finally letting out a few laughs. "HeheheHAHAHA"

"Finally broken?" Your "interrogator" says, still continuing to skillfully tickle every inch of your armpits.

You nod, showing you won't break that easily; as she sees your response, you begin feeling an even stronger sensation. This time, instead of scratching, she's mixing things up by slowing down and rubbing with her palms, giving you a false sense of your torture stopping, and then ripping that away by going back to scratching the inside of your underarm, rising in intensity and slowing down, repeating over and over again.

As you continue laughing you begin to feel sweat trickle down your neck and drool falling out of your mouth from exhaustion. The agent stops and moves in front of you. "Hehehe, you didn't take that to well. Are you finally ready to tell me what you know? If you refuse, you'll soon find out what I can really do." She finishes, looking you dead in the eyes.
15513121.title: Goes for your armpits!

1553.content:
The Island
Shipwrecked far from any land or shipping lanes, you find yourself stranded on an uncharted island and at the mercy of the natives, the wildlife and something much, much worse. Do you try to escape before you're a broken ticklish mess? Or have you finally found your true calling on an island of ticklephiles?


Slaves of mirth
In a strange, beautiful, but primitive world the dominant race are a soft-furred people who possess both great strength and exquisite cruelty. Humans unlucky enough to fall into their captivity quickly find themselves at the mercy of the native "fur-skins," who prize their "bare-skin" slaves for one quality alone- their ticklishness.

The slaves of mirth live their lives vulnerable to tickling every minute of the day, from teasing and playful to unending agony, as it might please their masters. Some learn to submit quickly, others must be broken, but in the end there is no escape from tickle slavery. And the fur-skins aren't the worst peril that this world holds for the ticklish...

(Please don't sue me mtjpub, I'm stretched too thin to get a third job).
1553.title: Other/Something else.

choices: A bikini and cutoff jean shorts
A third option- my preferred outfit is not represented above
15531.content:
Slowly but surely, you return to the world of the living. Your memories up to now are hazy and disjointed. You remember- a boat? The ocean. And then- And then you can’t remember much else except water filling your lungs and the darkness closing in.

And now? You look around but your immediate surroundings are dark. What you can guess is that you’re in some sort of building made of bamboo or something else used to make huts in tropical jungles. Oddly specific, but your just grasping at straws. You could be anywhere. But you can’t move from there because you’re lying on your back, wrists and ankles stretching you out tight. It’s not the ground, you think- feels more like a camp bed against your bare back.

There’s enough light to see your body, clad in...
15531.title: In the dark

choices: You remember Caleb and Aiden (F/M storyline)
You remember Hannah and Sophie (F/F storyline)
The hut door opens suddenly (you're all alone)
155311.content:
A floral bikini top and cutoffs are all that cover your taut body. Thankfully its warm enough in here for you not to feel cold but that’s the least of your concerns right now. Try as you might, there’s no way you can get yourself free of these binds. Until whoever it was that tied you like this comes back you’re stuck here.

It’s not an idea that thrills you.

But while you’re waiting you try to collect your thoughts. It’s- hard. For some reason there’s not much you can remember and there's a weird sound coming from outside that your fuzzy mind can't seem to recognize. Vague memories of time on a boat spring to mind. Something, something Pacific Ocean and an island growing ever closer.

And then…
155311.title: Foggy recollection

choices: Two natives in loincloths and a European female
A native witchdoctor with brushes, feathers, and paints
1553113.content: Now fully returned to your senses, you are fairly certain that anyone who would bind you stretched spread-eagle across a bamboo hut probably doesnâ€™t have your best interests at heart. Not wishing to alert anyone outside of your intentions, you begin to tug and yank and pull at the cords that hold you, but there is barely any give. You lay there, tired and perspiring, are just about to consider going ahead and calling out for help when:
1553113.title: Who can it be now?

choices: A not quite docile tickle-slave of a rich family
An escaped human on the run from fur-skin bounty hunters
A human who has disobeyed too much and is about to be punished
15532.content:
You are a member of the human population of your planet, Gargelia, a species which makes up about 50% of the planet's sapient life. The other half is the Laphu, or fur-skins, who are constantly hunting down humans like you to capture and tickle. None of the great thinkers of the constantly hiding and relocating human race has been able to pinpoint why the fur-skins have such an inclination towards tickling, but they have realized the hard way that the fur-skinned race is perfectly evolved for inflicting maximum tickle torture.

This furry, slightly feline race possess small claws perfect for slashing clothing and gripping surfaces while chasing fleeing humans, and can retract the claws to let their furred fingers do the tickling. Their fingers, able to poke and prod as well as lightly tickle with a soft coat of fur that covers all of their body are well suited for gripping onto wriggling sides and digging into exposed armpits. As intelligent as humans if not more so, this race utilizes any and all tools available as well: feathers, hairbrushes, dusters, oil, tongues, vibrators, and many devious invented tickle-weapons used to catch and torment humans. Despite their eagerness to use any means available to tickle, the Laphu prefer to be up close and personal when tickling, as it brings them sexual pleasure as well.

You begin your story as...
15532.title: Time for fluffy tickles!

155321.content:
You are everything the Laphu look for in a human. Attractive, fit, and horribly sensitive to the slightest touch. You are the sort of Gargelia specimen they consider a ticklish treasure.

         When your friend went missing in the woods, the elders warned you and the other young who knew her not to go looking for her. It was as if they knew she was already lost to them forever. But you couldnâ€™t accept that, and went off into the misty jungle depths to find her.

         And that is how you wound up in your current situation. As you made your way through the dense jungle, you were chased by a pair of enormous beetles who corralled you down a slope near the edge of a muddy bog. Once there, it was a simple process to slop enough mud on you before they rolled you into thick ball of muck, with only your head and hands and feet still poking out!

         The beetles then left you there like that, utterly helpless to what or whoever might come along. You spent an entire night like that, being driven mad by especially tickly insects that would alight on your feet, head and hands, seemingly intent on inflicting the worst possible ticklish sensations.

         The following day, you were â€˜rescuedâ€™ by a group of croaking, slobbering amphibian creatures who proceeded to clean you up and sell you to your current masters, an aristocratic family of Laphu.

         The gorgeous matriarch is Frau Scratchen, and she has a most cruel imagination when it comes to tormenting bare-skins. For some reason, she seems to take an especial glee in making your pathetic life utterly humiliating. As if she has an innate understanding of what the Gargelia find most mortifying.

         The Alpha male is rarely around, but takes about the same notice of you as you might the family pet.

         There are two older, almost adult members of the family. The female seems to almost really care for you, while the male seems to have nothing but disdain for you, and has nearly injured you on more than one occasion. He feels that you should be bred for the tickle-wrestling ring to battle other bare-skins in bouts for the betting amusement of Laphu who attend.

         The younger children of the Scratchen clan are a lot more playful and innocent in their tickling antics than the adults. The drawback is that they just donâ€™t know when to quit!

         To judge by the star cycles, youâ€™ve been a captive slave to these fur-skins for nearly a month. You have to admit, they do feed and care for you, and you are kept more safe and comfy then you ever were with your own people; but you find the extended bouts of tickling, the ridiculous, humiliating costumes and adornments you are made to wear, and the â€˜tricksâ€™ they have you perform are just too much for you to take. Strangely, though you can make out most of what they are saying, when you try to communicate with them, they treat it much as you would if your dog started barking for nothing, seemingly unable to grasp what you mean. Or unwilling to believe that you have that level of intelligence.

         All this, and you are still no nearer to finding out what happened to the dear friend you originally went out looking for in the impenetrable wilderness.


[Chapter Addition Note: While familiar with MTJ Pubs, I have no more idea of what I'm going by than the descriptions of the milieu as described in the previous branches. So if any of the above breaks with canon, I apologize.]
155321.title: A not quite docile tickle-slave of a rich family

choices: One of the older daughters drags you up to her room with some of her friends
Some spiteful brats want to tickle you half to death
1553212.content:
You wake up the next morning with a slight feeling of dread, your routine having set in enough for you to expect it but not enough for you to get used to it. Break from the fur-skins' schools has begun, and today is the first day the children of the Scratchen household will be home free, something that excites them greatly but instills fear in your heart. The matriarch, Frau Scratchen, is also present in the manor you call your home, and you hope to stay out of her way. The only members of the family that owns you which aren't in the house are the Alpha Male, the father, who is some kind of official and rarely around, and the oldest child. You thank your gods for the latter's abscense; he is an irascible brute who's taken an unnecessary disliking to you.

You sit up on the bed in the small closet like room you as the family pet have been given and rub your wrists, noting the damned bracelet affixed to your left one is still there. Whether technology or magic, the wristband weakens your strength according to whoever controls it, preventing you from overpowering someone in an escape attempt and making it so even the littlest fur skin can hold you still for a tickly game. Most of the time they aren't that cruel, and mostly allow you power over your own body.

The Suddenly, you're dragged out of your room by one of your many owners for some fun.
1553212.title: Ticklish Plaything/Amusement for the Kids

choices: You can't hold it. You scream with laughter and Frau Scratchen is not happy.
One of the little dastards stuffs something in your mouth. You scream into it.
Latvid's home and he shows the kids how the piggy game is really played.
15532122.content:
The sound of lots of little furry feet could be heard and you hoped they'd scamper by and leave you be. The sounds of little fists banging on your door broke your heart as this definitely seemed to be where they wanted to go. Thank god the little monsters weren't tall enough to get the knob on their own. Maybe you could pretend that you were still asleep and couldn't hear them? Sure you'd get punished but their playtime was something you really hated.

''My little one's what's the matter? Why all of the banging?''
''We wanna play with Pinky.''

That dream died on the vine with the voice of Frau Scratchen. She was tall enough to get the door open and since it didn't have a lock you were done. You hid your head under the pillow as the door opened, best to pretend you were asleep anyway maybe they'll go away? You bundled the sheet's on your floor bed around as you heard all those damnable little Laphu kids crowd in.

''Ohhh he's still asleep. Maybe you should let him sleep. He is still new here after all.''
''Moooom my friends came over to see him though! Your making look dumb in front of all my friends!''
''Ohhh Est fine but go easy on him. He's in a new place after all and it's probably frightening.''

How many friends had they brought over? Gods they had eight younglings already plus a middle daughter who always seemed to be in her room. Did they really need more in this damned house?! It sounded like there was a whole pack of them in here what was it ''Bring your class home day?!''

''Fiiine we're only playing anyway. I wanna show them the piggie game that Latvid told me about!''

The what?!

''Have fun then I'll be upstairs having a nap if you need me.''
''Okay mom everyone come here but keep it down. I want to get him while he's sleeping so we can show what being a lazy bones gets you.''

...This seemed to have backfired on you. As you heard them crowd around you weighed your options. Wake up now and they'd figure out you'd been pretending then you'd really get it. You tensed beneath the sheets as furry little hands tucked the sheets under you and wrapped them before they pulled you from your floor bed and out of your hole in the wall room and down the hall. You kicked and struggled but your damnable bracelet had you weak as...well weaker than these kittens. Every once in awhile either one of the youngest or their friends would sneak a devious little hand in and get you squealing like a newborn Laphu. When they finally stopped and you shook yourself out you saw that you were now in the living room.

''Wakey wakey Pinkie! Time to greet the day and our friends!''

When the sheet on your head was pulled back you couldn't help yourself from going pale. Gods the Scratchen's had five of their kit's but now there was almost a dozen of them. The demonic little littler that had tormented you for almost a month had more than doubled! You tried to squirm in your hastily made mummification but one evil little kitten climbed atop your chest and stared you down so that the bracelet kept you so weak that even the sheet might as well have been steel.

''I wanna play the piggy game already Est!''

You felt a pair of furry little hands rummaging around in the sheets down past where you could see and knew that they were your hunting your piggies. You pulled and juked your feet in your tomb as best you could getting many frustrated groans from the brats. You were doing a good job at keep away until the little jerks cheated. You felt something almost impossibly soft and definitely tickly intrude upon your ear and the fit of giggles you burst into distracted you long enough that that little turd playing at hunter almost got your left foot instead of having it in their hands they light scratched along the sole and made you jump in your wrappings and yipe loudly.

''EEEEHHHEEEEPPPAHA!!''
''Wow! that was loud Est!''
''Yeah it was! Did you get his feet?!''
''I almost did but they got away cuz' I got scared by his roar!''
''Stupid!! Humans don't roar! Laphu roar! Humans....hang on my brother told me what it's called...Squeak! That's what humans do they squeak!''
''EST!!''

Frau Scratchen screamed down from upstairs and all the kids winced at her volume. It easily dwarfed your own ''squeak'' from earlier.

''YEAH MOM?!''
''WHAT WAS THAT NOISE?! WHAT ARE YOU DOING TO THE HUMAN!?''
''WE WERE JUST CLEANING PINKIES EARS MOM! HE WAS SCRATCHING AT THEM SO WE THOUGHT WE'D HELP!''
''YOU KIDS BE NICE TO THAT POOR THING! KEEP IT DOWN TOO!!''
''OK MOM!''

''I nearly got his paws that time Est!''
''How is this human beating you?!''
''Gimme another chance Est!''
''No you're useless. Shanna help him here and catch those paws! As for you human, you make that much noise again and we'll have to fill that silly mouth of yours with something other than pet food. Now you know what this is right Pinky?''

The pup Hunter held up the tool that had led to your near-miss and you instantly recognized it. An Iksi frond. The Laphu used the stems of the plants to clean their damnable paws and ears.The Lady of the house Frau Scratchen had first introduced you to them one night when she cleaned your ears with it but that had gone further when due to what she called ''Your absolutely adorable'' reactions and before you knew it she was using it for more than just that. Thankfully she'd really seen to taken a shine to you and was always kind to you. You now really appreciated her restraint since you found out how bad the evil little flower could be in the hands of a meaner Laphu and in the ears of poor old you.

As the pair of Laphu pups once again began rummaging in the sheets for your sensitive feet for wahtever ''The Piggy Game'' was the head troublemaker himself Est held you tight and inserted the Iksi stick into your ear and teased you mercilessly. You bucked and squirmed in the pup's grasp giggling and wheezing while fuzzy fingers caught ahold of your feetsies and dragged them out in front the whooping and hollering Laphu jackals.The two little monsters held your ankles as the others crowded around to view their new toys. Est gave the frond one last little twirl in your ear before finally pulling it out of your poor sensitive ear and letting you catch your breath.

''See Pinky? Was that so bad?! Let's play a new game. The piggy game!!''

You tried to pull your feet out of the grip of the diminutive devils but that bracelt had you weaker than a newborn human in these adolescent's paws and so they kept hold of there prizes. One of the little devils had taken up Est's iksi stick and was now gently tickling around your ear driving you into snickers as the others crowded around for Est's show.

''Okaaay now first this piggy shows that humans are weak, They giggle and squeal at the slightest toe tweaks!''

She gripped your big toe at the beginning of the and lightly twiddled it back and forth as she sang while scraping at the delicate pad. You bucked and went mad but wisely kept your voice down knowing how cruel kids could really get. The other pups laughed and climbed atop you to get a better look at your reddening cheeks which they poked and scratched at while the Iksi stick bothered your ear. Your attempts to turn your head away led the pups atop you to grip you by the chin and hold your face steady for their compatriot's ease. Est laughed as she continued on with her game.

''This little piggy's called the lever everybody!''
''Why Est?''
''Watch!''

She bent the toe back abit and you felt hot tears start to leak out from behind your eyes which you'd screwed shut at the embarassing torment. The pups laughed harder at your hilarious expressions and you even felt a tongue sneak in and taste of your tears. You heard a voice in your ear reminding you to keep quiet or it would get worse for you. You were trying to keep it in in but you and them knew it was a matter of time till you broke. You were holding your breath in to try and choke it down...
15532122.title: Some spiteful brats want to tickle you half to ...

choices: A new comer to the tickle arena!
Lost in a circus with more than just clowns laughing
15533.content: Alright picky aye? Well look no further! We've got some great specials in here!
15533.title: These suck- Next!

155332.content:
Another hour had passed and there was no sign of anyone. Your plan of ditching your parents because "I'm 18 and I'm too old to be seen with you," has officially backfired. Not only were you dumb enough to blindly run off, but you left the map with your parents. You'd think there would be extra copies around somewhere, but not even scraps of the colorful paper could be found.

It had become dark within the last few minutes of you wandering around. That's when you realized you were truly screwed. The circus closed at sundown. The feeling of loneliness took firm hold as you found a bench and sat down, shaking slightly from what you could only guess as fear. Taking a second to look up, you notice the fun house dead in front of you, a mirror reflecting you on the moonlit bench.
155332.title: Laughing in the Big Top

choices: Awaken hanging from your wrist, on in your socks and boxers
1553321.content:
Well duh! You walked in a guy of course you are still a guy! It's the circus. Not the gender bender.

You look over your clothes, noticing a bit of dirt on your jeans. You straightened out your tshirt and kicked some dirt of your high tops. You make your way to one of the sofa stands and grab a water sitting there. You were quite thirsty after your run around. You took a couple sips but stopped as you heard faint laughter. It was a relief knowing you weren't alone. Quickly running in the direction you realize something. The laughter is a bit forced and you can here begs mixed in. Before you reach the source a solid object slams into your head and everything goes dark.
1553321.title: You're a guy

15533212.content:
Awakening with a slight headache you notice it's pitch black and you can hardly see anything. The room you're in is slightly hotter than usual and you feel the chains holding your arms above your head. As you begin to feel a few drops of sweat trickle down your sides, the room blooms with vibrant, colorful lights. Then you hear the sound of a voice coming from a speaker.

"Come one, come all! Watch the show of the most tickle-sensitive man alive!" It announces aloud.

Tickle sensitive, what kind of joke is this? You think to yourself as you pull at your chains. You begin to observe your surroundings; it's a large circus tent, with dark red walls, and a large entrance near the front. You look down and notice you are in the middle of a hardwood stage, with curtains behind you. You also notice a spinning wheel on the side of the stage, something like out of a game show.

As you try to squint and read it, a girl dressed up as a clown comes out from the curtains. She has red hair, with white face makeup and red lipstick. She's wearing a colorfully striped skirt and shirt with black shoes. As she comes onto the stage with a microphone set up, a crowd rolls in and takes seats in front of the stage.

The clown girl begins to talk, as the viewers take their seats, "Welcome everyone, and be prepared to witness the most delicate skin in your life! Tonight, one man will partake in the wheel of tickles!" She says presenting you and the wheel.

"Each section of the wheel has a specific type of challenge to be faced, now let's start the first spin."

As they slowly walk towards you, the crowd begins to lean on the edge of their seats.

Realizing there's a huge crowd here, and that you're just about to be tickled by clown girls for "entertainment" you start to panic.

"W-whoa, hey, I'm not supposed to be here, you must have me mixed up-hehehehehe" You say, feeling one of them slide a feather across your side. One after another, they all begin to join in. You feel them lightly dart the feathers all over your body, along with the brushes in your deep pits.

"HEY-HEHHAHAHAHAHHAA" You start to giggle out, as they begin speeding up the strokes along your body. A large amount of murmurs and giggles begin to arise from the crowd, as they've just seen someone crumble into a laughing mess from a few tickles.

Delighted to see the crowd's reaction and your reaction, the clowns begin explore other parts of your body. The city of Megapolis was home to many kinds of costumed people. Superheroes of all kinds, mystic, science, alien and martial artists battled their various villains with sometimes mixed results. Go as either hero or villain aainst the costumed inhabitants of the city and see if you can defend or conquer the place. Although, insted of Kryptonite, everyone seems to share the same, ticklish weakness instead.

An evil cult lives in the world, worshipping a series of beings called 'The Laughing Ones'. Their aim is to break free from their prison when the stars are right and plunge the world into hystiercal madness. It would be up to you and some allies to uncover the conspiacy and stop the cult before they enact their plan.

15533331.content:
Are you an aspiring young hero, bristling with latent mutant powers recently surfaced? Were you given a powerful tool by the last dying member of a distant alien race, on the condition that you use it only for good? Did your brilliant mind enable you to develop the technology you needed to fight the criminal syndicate that killed your parents? Are you a powerless detective, relying on wits and savvy alone to help you survive encounters with supervillains?

Or are you a villain? Did your lab experiment go horribly wrong, scarring you for life and leaving you with a vendetta against the world that wronged you? Do you gleefully sow anarchy and chaos to show to the good guys once and for all that life is futile? Are you a member of a shadowy cult seeking to impose its doctrine upon humanity? Or are you simply an anti-hero whose methods frequently clash with the law?

No matter what you choose, one thing stays the same: In Megapolis, supers often use their powers to tickle, and some may even be themed around it.
15533331.title: To Megapolis

155333311.content:
Of course! You were on the side of justice from the start, helping to protect the citizens of Megapolis from the darker side of the city. However, just like every other superhero here, you too have your own strange and unique powers to use. Perhaps you've turned to magic as your source of strength? Maybe recent advancement in technology has become your best friend? Or are you an old-school superhero with natural superpowers?

Whichever the case is, the villains are always up to no good, even now. Time to find out what powers you have and use them for the greater good!
155333311.title: Be a hero!

1553333111.content:
It all seemed cliché at how you've gotten your super power. While researching in a laboratory just on the outskirts of Megapolis, an accidental slip-up caused you to fall into the prototype mass-ion chamber before the automated protocols started to activate the machine, bombarding your whole body with blinding purple UV light. By the time the machine powered down, you found yourself looking into a mirror, amazed at how you survived. However, as you reached out, the warm sensation of a hand touching yours almost made you pass out from shock; the sound of two females screaming could be heard coming from the chamber.

Ever since that day, you tested your newfound powers in the comfort of your own house. After the first few episodes of shrieking at the fact that you could make multiple copies of yourself appear, your power came in surprisingly handy in everyday chores. Soon, it almost became a daily routine for you to clone yourself to grab a mug of coffee, clean your room and wash the dishes all at the same time.

Of course, while amazed at having such a power, you realized it also came with drawbacks. During an incident were one of your clones spilled some hot coffee on her arm, the many sounds of your voices could be heard hissing and swearing around the house as all of you fell to the floor, nursing your hand. Deciding to test your powers once more, you started with one clone before pinching yourself, both of you winced at the pain, even though no one was actually pinching ‘you’, per say. Gulping, you already realized the implications of this. If any of your clones were to get hurt… it certainly wouldn't go well for all of you.

A few weeks later, you encountered another problem. While you could clone yourself up to a maximum of six times, you had to actually be in physical contact for your clones to return into you. Rubbing your head as you sighed; you recalled that particular incident when you had to trawl across the entire 20 floors of the recently constructed Displexian mall just to find one of your lost selves who went shopping.

While satisfied at having a decent understanding of your powers, the thought of doing something more came to you one day as you turned on the television, another commercial of Supergirl capturing two robbers playing during the commercial intermission. You could become a superhero with your powers! With many copies of yourself, you could outnumber the enemies and capture them! You’ve even heard of the Superhero’s association in the middle of the city, where rookie sidekicks up to veteran heroes frequently visited and stayed at, training and resting before their next mission. While you are technically a superhero for a hobby now, it was still worth a shot.

About to turn off the tv, an alert blared past, a news anchor reporting on the recent attack upon the local bank by the Grinning Goons. If you were to drop by and stop them, word would quickly spread about the new superhero on the block. Looking at your wardrobe however, you wondered if you were even fit to appear on the news…
1553333111.title: The power of cloning

155333312.content:
The city. At dawn.

I watch the light seep through the edges of the city, turning the grey skyscrapers into bright golden towers, the skyline into a glowing magnificent landscape straddling the horizon. The people, milling across the narrow streets, and the cold morning air crystallizing their breath. The cars already choking the roads. Shopkeepers dusting their entrances with brooms. Stray cats and dogs prowling behind alleys. The beginnings of life starting to seep into the city.

And the heroes.

The first ones come flying through the air, drawing pale knife edges in the sky. From this far, even with my supervision I can't tell the colors of their capes, the symbols on their chests. Their formation is perfect, like fighter jets, and the gust of their passing is like a beckoning to us mortals. The newspaper flaps in my hand, some rats near the gutter are sent into a frenzy, a few people to look up in awe, hands holding their hats from being blown away, children point and scream in delight.

The next heroes are the digital ones. Even worse. Their faces flicker to life in blazing color across animated billboards and built-in TV screens across skyscrapers and glass buildings. Gorgeous radiant 50 foot tall faces smile down at the streets, promoting brands, promoting justice, promoting themselves. I sip my coffee quietly as I watch a Lightning Girl commercial leap across four building faces as she fights Dr. Nefarious.

It's such a disgrace that I almost break my coffee cup. Beneath my thick overcoat, my own supercharged suit thrums with righteous anger. At the moment, in Megapolis' asylum, screams are being emitted and flashlights dropped in shock as my former guards are discovering the body double I had swapped myself with. Soon the heroes will be alerted. Soon the hunt. But for now...

The coffee cup shatters in my augmented strength. For now I shall have my reckoning.

But who is to be my target? I can think of two options. The first is Nightingale. A lone wolf. She haunts the deepest underbelly of glorious Megapolis. A whispered terror among criminals, an anti-hero of sorts, who strikes fear in the hearts of criminals just as surely as conventional heroes foster inspiration in citizens. She wears a ninja-like outfit with tattoos over her bare arms and wields a high-tech arsenal of laser katanas, energy shurikens, and who knows what else. Her inky dark hair is tied in a long ponytail behind her and she sports an onyx mask shaped vaguely like the curved wings of a nightingale. I had lost to her in combat two times in the past because while she does not have super strength per se, she relies on martial arts and cunning and her technology which has earned her the reputation as one of the deadliest heroes out there. Luckily for me, due to our constant encounters I have a good idea where she'll be.

The second is Sunfyre. She's fairly new to the hero scene, and enormously popular due to her natural beauty and sheer power. She has bright red hair framing a freckled slender face, green eyes the color of shamrocks, and expressive, plump lips that can flash into an irresistible smile for her followers. Her outfit is surprisingly conflicting to her natural advantages for it is conservative: a white and gold spandex with golden gauntlets and boots and a huge cream colored cape. Like most overpowered heroes, she has no mask, and is very friendly and open to reporters. I'm not sure what her full power set is but I've seen her throw massive pillars of golden light that cut through concrete like butter. She can cloak herself in a supernova of that stuff and be pretty much invulnerable. Cons are that she'll be a nightmare to defeat but nothing will feel better than taking Ms. Beauty Pagent down a notch.

Of course, the heroes aren’t immune to dishing out tickling: they have found that a villain’s henchmen or bounty hunters working for villains can be persuaded to give out valuable information through a tickle interrogation. And it would be a true shame to leave out the fact that villains tickle the allies of heroes to get them to talk.

So, which part of the population of Megapolis are you with: are you just a civilian trying to lead a life in a town of supers, or do you have a stake in who should win (even if it can change from time to time)?

Our parents and sister weren't home but they said I could take him to the park and teach him how to ride the bike. About an hour later he was starting to get the hang of it. He was really good at it but then he fell and skinned his knee and elbow. I took him home and he tried his best not to cry. I was heartbroken at seeing how hurt he was. When I poured achohal on his skinned knee and elbow to disinfect it he was trying his best to look strong but tears just kept comming form his eyes. He sat there crying silently. As I wrapped a bandage tightly around his knee and elbow he couldn't hold it in so he cried loudly. "A-are y-you done?" He asked me through his tears. "Yes I'm done." I said kissing him on the forehead. He then patted my stomach. When we do this it means many things. The first time ment that I loved him and I would keep him safe no matter what and that he loved me too. In this case it meant in sorry and when he patted my stomach it ment its okay and thank you. I felt like I failed him. I let him get hurt. I should have done something. Deep down I know that there was nothing I could have done. (End of flashback) I could see that Oliver was scared to fly. I knew this would happen so before we left I packed his favorite stuffed animal. "Oliver." I whispered. "I brought Barry." I say handing him a soft stuffed sloth. "T-thanks." Oliver said holding him in his left arm. "C-can I hold y-your hand S-Shawn?" I hear him ask me. "Of course." I say handing him my left hand. He grabbed my hand tightly but not enough to hurt at all. As we took off I squeezed his hand to let him know that it was going to be all right. "Do you want me to sing to you?" I asked. "Umm y-yes p-please." He tells me. He's obviously stressed from flying. I run my finger over his hair with my other hand. As soon as he fell asleep I kissed him on the forehead. "Sleep well little one." I see that he looks cold and give him my jacket. Not long after I fall asleep.

15533333211112221111211221112211.content: At lunch you walk by yourself to your locker on the other side of school. As you walk some 11th grade boy pushes you on the ground. "Hey rich boy." He says grabing a note from Oliver. "L-let go of me! D-dont touch t-that!" You yell. "I can't get my mouth to say the things I want to say to you that's why I wrote to you.
