You're gay aren't you." He said. "I-I'm not. Thats f-for my b-brother." You call Oliver your brother and not your adoptive brother for the first time in a while. "Oh yeah right." The one holing you says throwing you on the ground. "G-give it back!" You yell. "No no no." He teases you. He then rips the note into 20 pieces and gives 2 to each of friends. Your eyes start to tear up. "Oh no he's going to cry over your note for your boy friend?" One of them said. "Give those back to him. Now!" You look up and see that Shawn is furious. "What are you going to do about it huh little singer?" They tease him. "In famous. In sure the fans would hate to know my best friend is being bullied." Shawn said looking angry. You start to pick up the papers that were ripped out of your notebooks as tears fell from your eyes. "You win this time singer." He said as everybody gave him the paper pieces. They leave and Shawn helps you get your things. "Here." He says handing you the ripped pieces of paper. You grab them and put them in your pocket. "I don't care if you like guys." Shawn says standing up and holding out his hand. You get up yourself and show him a pice of the paper that said: that it is love. I love you Oliver no matter what. "Oh. I'm sorry I didn't know." He says to you. "Course you didn't." You say and walk to your locker. "Hey I didnt mean to offend you!" Shawn calls after you. "Im not offended." You tell him sternly. "You clearly are and I'm so so sorry." Shawn says. "I said I'm not offended!" You yell at him. "O-okay I'm sorry." Shawn tells you. "No I'm s-sorry. I shouldn't have yelled at you." You say starting to tear up. "Imma g-go now." You say and run to your next class. After school you don't wait for Shawn to drive you home instead you run home. As soon as you get to Hatch Manor you run to Oliver. "Oliver. Come here." You tell him. "Um okay?" He says. You take him to your room nd he sits down on your bed. "When we walked, when we laugh, when we spend our time walking by the ocean side. Our hands are gently intertwined. I have a feeling I just can't describe. I assume this is typical of love. In my dreams. When you're with me I always have a feeling that's hard to describe. But I know now that it is love. I love you Oliver no matter what." You tell him. "Oliver stands up and walks over to you. He then hugs you. His head only reaches bellow your chest and above your slightly toned stomach. Just then the doorbell rings. You and Oliver go downstairs and see its Shawn. When you open the door Shawn gives you a big hug. "Is e-everything o-okay?" You ask. Shawn kneels down a bit and hugs Oliver. "Sorta" He says. "I'm going on tour." He says. "Oh." You and Oliver say. "Um...congratulations." You say. "Thanks." He says. "I just couldn't leave without knowing that were cool. Right?" Shawn says hopefully. "Always no matter what." You tell him. "Thanks. That means more than you could imagine. Anyways. I brought you guys something. These are really important to me. So its like pices of my heart, make them all your own, so when we are apart, you'll never be alone. And when you fall asleep just rember we lay under the same stars. I may be far but never gone. Oliver this is for you." Shawn says giving him a custom doller coin with the word friend ingraved on it. "It looks similar to the one I gave you." Oliver tells him. Shawn pulls out the gold coin Oliver gave him. "And I will never lose mine." Shawn says. "Then I won't lose mine either." Oliver says hugging Shawn. "And for you." Shawn says pulling out a string. "This is a string from my first gutair. Don't ever take it of. Unless you're taking a shower or swimming or something that might cause you to lose it of course." Shawn tied the string around your wrist like a bracelet, not loose enough to fall off or tight enough to cut off blood flow. "I have one too." Shawn said lifting up his hand showing you his string from his gutair. "I won't ever lose it. Nor take it off." You say giving him a gigantic hug. "I promise I will see you again." He tells you. "Here's proof." He says giving you v.i.p tickets to a show. "These tickets are v.i.p. Best seats. Its the last location right here in Toronto. After the show come backstage." Be says. "Thanks. We'll be there." You tell him. "Until next time." Shawn says. "Untill n-next time." You say. Oliver begans to cry into your chest/stomach. "Shawn." You call after him. "Yeah?" He turns around. "Break a leg." You say giving him a thumbs up. He smiles and nods. "I'll keep in touch." He says.

The first Monday without Shawn
It was snowing outside when you were walking to school and all you could think was how Shawn was doing. You get through your classes well and at lunch time like usual you don't eat. You get through the rest of the day but feel emlty. When you get home Oliver asks you to call Shawn. You put it on speaker while it rings. You are instantly sent to voicemail and listen to Shawn's voice. "Hey there. I'm probably busy at the moment and I will see if I can call you back got it? Have a nice day. And if you want to leave me a message press one please." The recorded message Shawn made said. You looked at Oliver and he nodded at you. "H-hey Shawn just wanted to see how you're doing. And we miss you. Hope you're having a great time and hope you're killing it." You say. "Now Oliver wants to leave you a message so here he is." You say. "Hi Shawn. I still have the coin. Hope you didn't lose mine. I really miss you and hope to see loss you soon. Bye." He says. You then end the message. About 5 hours later at 8:00pm Shawn face times you. "Hey buddy." He says. "Hi Shawn." You say getting up from your desk and walking up to the 4th floor where Oliver's room is. "How you doin." He says. "Good. And you? How did you're first show go?" You ask walking up the stairs. "It was great. They really loved the song we made together. I told them it was for my best friend and they started cheering super loud." He says. You then start to blush. "Oliver!" You call. "Yeah?" He says comming out from his room. "Look." You show him your phone. "Is that Shawn?" He asks. "You bet its me!" He says. "How you've been?." The three of you talk for hours.
The day before Shawn gets home.
You go to your locker and grab your things. You turn around and see some bullies. It was the begging of summer so you were wearing jeans and a short sleeve button up shirt. One of them grabs your arm. "What's this? A braclet from your boyfriend?" He teases you. "Singer boy isn't here to help you now is he?" He says. "No! Don't touch that! Leave it alone!" You yell. The bully then unties the string Shawn gave you from his first gutair. "No!" You scream. "Oh you want this?" They tease you. "Yes I'll go anything. That's really important to me! Please give it to me I'll do anything!" You start to sob. "Then scream you have a boyfriend." He says. "Scream it!" He yells. You stop crying and do what he says. "I have a boyfriend!" You scream. The bullies start to laugh it you. "Here." He says throwing the string on top of a door frame. "No!" You scream. The bullies leave and you jump trying to get the string. You're so close to grabing it but its to far. You sit on the ground and bring your knees up to your chest and start to cry. Someone taps you on your shoulder and you look up and see the string hanging in front of you. You grab it and tie it around your wrist. You look up and see Shawn's sister. "Hi." She says. You wipe away your tears. "Um H-hi." You say getting up. "I was wondering if Shawn told you anything about what time he was comming back?" She says. "Oh. He's comming t-tomorrow at 7:00am." You tell her. "Thanks." She said. "How did you get this down?" You ask her showing her the string. "I threw a rock at it." She said. "See you later I need to get to my school." She says. "Bye." You say.
The day Shawn gets back.
The whole day at school you were smiling and didn't let the bullies bug you. When school ended you ran home, changed, grabbed Oliver, grabbed the tickets, and ran to where the concert was going to be. You held Oliver in your arms and he held the tickets. You ran past the security guards and ran towards Shawn. Shawn was facing the other way when you put Oliver down and the two of you ran towards him but a gaurd jumped on you and grabbed Oliver. "What do you think you're doing boys?" He said sternly. Shawn turned around and saw you and Oliver. "Its okay they're with me." Shawn says. "I should've told you before sorry." Shawn tells the gaurd. "If you say so." He says. You run and over push Shawn over when you give him a hug. After the show is over...

So you had to get a new student just because you're so bad?" A blonde kid walks up and asks. "If he didn't get in the first time why is he even here? They should've never let you in!" He says. Tears fill your eyes so you walk up and walk away covering your face. A girl comes up behind the boy and hits him, knocking him out. "Sorry about him." She apologizes. "Deku mabye you should go see if he's okay?" Uraraka tells Deku. "I'll go." Todoroki says and stands up. You sit in an empty hall and bring you knees to your chest and cry into your knees. A minute later Todoroki sits next to you. You didn't see him until he out his hand on your shoulder. You jumped and scooted away wiping your face. "Please....j-just go away...l-leave me alone." You told him. "The only way I'll leave is if you're with me." He says. "Please." You say and break down in tears. "Come on stop crying. I've gone through worse." Todoroki says and sees you're still crying. "We all have a weakness. I don't know why I'm talking about weaknesses right now, but I had a weakness." He says. "W-what was it?" You ask. "I didnt like using my fire so if I used my ice too much I would get too cold. But now I use my fire so I can use my ice as much as I want." He says. "You got a weakness?" He asks. You stop crying and blush. "Its embrassing." You say. "Come on I told you what mine was." He says poking your side. You jump and let out a giggle. "Is that it?" He asks. You blush and don't answer. He knocks you over and sits on your waist. He starts poking you sides over and over. You squirm and try to get away. "Hahah yeah! Hahah stop!" You beg. "Todoroki!" Someone yells. "Keep your hands to yourself and when someone says to stop you stop!" He yells. You see that it was Iida. "Yeah yeah." Todoroki says. He gets up and holds out his hand. You take it and...

info.description:
Choose a ticklish story-line, and immerse yourself into the world of tickles!

A few guidelines to follow if you are to add to the interactive:
- Try to have correct grammar. (A few minor mistakes are fine.)
- Avoid short chapters if possible. (Preferably 500+ characters.)
- This is a tickling interactive, so stick with tickling please.
- Sexual interactions are allowed, and encouraged, provided you fit them in well.
- Write as if you're talking to the reader (I forgot what that's called); ex: "You are tickled" or "She/he tickles you".
- Female ticklers preferred, but male ticklers are allowed.
- Feel free to add chapters, and enjoy! :D

Goals:
10 Chapters
25 Chapters
50 Chapters
75 Chapters
100 Chapters Thanks to those who contributed! :)
